2. Marginal Fisher Analysis

2.1 Marginal Fisher Analysis

LDA 假设每个类别的数据符合高斯分布，然而这个条件在现实问题中通常是不满足的。我们使用上面提到的降维算法框架来设计一个新的算法 Marginal Fisher Analysis (MFA)。

固有图包含同类型数据间的链接关系，每个样本都与其同类型中最相近的 k1k_1k1​ 个最相近的数据相连。惩罚图包含了不同类别之间边缘点 的相连关系。如图所示

遵循图嵌入框架，同类别内部精密程度由固有图构建：

S~c=∑i∑i∈Nk1+(j) or j∈Nk1+(i)∣∣wTxi−wTxj∣∣2=2wTX(D−W)XTw,Wij={1,  if  i∈Nk1+(j)  or  j∈Nk1+(i)0,  else\begin{aligned}\tilde{S}_c & =\sum_i\sum_{i\in N_{k_1}^+(j)\, or\, j\in N_{k_1}^+(i)}||w^Tx_i-w^Tx_j||^2\\& = 2w^TX(D-W)X^Tw,\\& W_{ij} = \left\{\begin{aligned}& 1,\; if\; i\in N_{k_1}^+(j)\; or\; j\in N_{k_1}^+(i)\\& 0,\;else\end{aligned}\right .\end{aligned}S~c​​=i∑​i∈Nk1​+​(j)orj∈Nk1​+​(i)∑​∣∣wTxi​−wTxj​∣∣2=2wTX(D−W)XTw,Wij​={​1,ifi∈Nk1​+​(j)orj∈Nk1​+​(i)0,else​​

其中，Nk1+(i)N^+_{k_1}(i)Nk1​+​(i) 表示样本 xix_ixi​ 的 k1k_1k1​ 个最近样本的下标集合。不同类别间的分散程度使用惩罚图表示

S~p=∑i∑(i,j)∈Pk2(ci) or (i,j)∈Pk2(cj)∣∣wTxi−wTxj∣∣2=2wTX(DP−WP)XTwWijP={1,  if  (i,j)∈Pk2(ci)  or  (i,j)∈Pk2(cj)0,  else\begin{aligned}\tilde{S}_p & = \sum_i\sum_{(i,j)\in P_{k_2}(c_i)\,or\,(i,j)\in P_{k_2}(c_j)}||w^Tx_i-w^Tx_j||^2\\& = 2w^TX(D^P-W^P)X^Tw\\& W_{ij}^P = \left\{\begin{aligned}& 1,\;if\;(i,j)\in P_{k_2}(c_i)\;or\;(i,j)\in P_{k_2}(c_j)\\& 0,\;else\end{aligned}\right .\end{aligned}S~p​​=i∑​(i,j)∈Pk2​​(ci​)or(i,j)∈Pk2​​(cj​)∑​∣∣wTxi​−wTxj​∣∣2=2wTX(DP−WP)XTwWijP​={​1,if(i,j)∈Pk2​​(ci​)or(i,j)∈Pk2​​(cj​)0,else​​

其中，Pk2(c)P_{k_2}(c)Pk2​​(c) 是在集合 {(i,j),i∈πc,j∉πc}\{(i,j),i\in\pi_c,j\notin\pi_c\}{(i,j),i∈πc​,j∈/​πc​} 中最相近的 k2k_2k2​ 对数据对。

MFA 的算法可以表示为下面的步骤：

  1. PCA 投影：首先将数据投影到 PCA 子空间中，保持 N−NcN-N_cN−Nc​ 个维度。用 WPCAW_{PCA}WPCA​ 表示 PCA 的转换矩阵。

  2. 构建类内紧密性和类间可分离性图：按上面的公式进行构建

  3. Marginal Fisher Criterion：由线性化图嵌入框架可得

    w∗=arg⁡min⁡wwTX(D−W)XTwwTX(DP−WP)XTww^*=\arg\min_w\frac{w^TX(D-W)X^Tw}{w^TX(D^P-W^P)X^Tw}w∗=argwmin​wTX(DP−WP)XTwwTX(D−W)XTw​

    这是图嵌入框架线性化的实例，B=DP−WPB=D^P-W^PB=DP−WP

  4. 输出最终结果：

    w=WPCAw∗w=W_{PCA}w^*w=WPCA​w∗

与 LDA 相比有以下优点：

  1. MFA 拥有比 LDA 更多的投影方向，且投影方向由 k2k_2k2​ 决定。
  2. 没有对数据分布的假设，类内的紧密性仅由每个数据与其 k1k_1k1​ 个最近数据点的距离之和计算得出。因此更普遍适用于判别分析。
  3. 没有对数据分布的先验信息，类间的间隔（上文的 S~P\tilde{S}_PS~P​）比之 LDA 的类间方差能更好的保留类间的可分离性。

2.2 Kernel Marginal Fisher Analysis

假设核函数为 k(xi,xj)=ϕ(xi)⋅ϕ(xj)k(x_i,x_j)=\phi(x_i)\cdot\phi(x_j)k(xi​,xj​)=ϕ(xi​)⋅ϕ(xj​)，对应的 kernel Gram matrix 是 Kij=K(xi,xj)K_{ij}=K(x_i,x_j)Kij​=K(xi​,xj​)。投影方向为 w=∑i=1Nαiϕ(xi)w=\sum_{i=1}^N\alpha_i\phi(x_i)w=∑i=1N​αi​ϕ(xi​)，最优化 α\alphaα 为

α∗=arg⁡min⁡ααTK(D−W)KααTK(DP−WP)Kα\alpha^*=\arg\min_{\alpha}\frac{\alpha^TK(D-W)K\alpha}{\alpha^TK(D^P-W^P)K\alpha}α∗=argαmin​αTK(DP−WP)KααTK(D−W)Kα​

在 KMFA 中的图与 MFA 的图会有所不同，在 KMFA 中，距离是在高维 Hibert 空间中计算的。两个样本 xix_ixi​ 和 xjx_jxj​ 的距离计算方式为

D(xi,xj)=k(xi,xi)+k(xj,xj)−2k(xi,xj)D(x_i,x_j)=\sqrt{k(x_i,x_i)+k(x_j,x_j)-2k(x_i,x_j)}D(xi​,xj​)=k(xi​,xi​)+k(xj​,xj​)−2k(xi​,xj​)​

对于一个新的数据点 x，它的最优投影方向为

F(x,α∗)=λ∑i=1nαi∗k(x,xi),λ=(α∗Kα∗)−1/2F(x,\alpha^*)=\lambda \sum_{i=1}^n\alpha^*_ik(x,x_i),\\\lambda=(\alpha^*K\alpha^*)^{-1/2}F(x,α∗)=λi=1∑n​αi∗​k(x,xi​),λ=(α∗Kα∗)−1/2

2.3 Tensor Marginal Fisher Analysis

  (w1,⋯ ,wn)∗=arg⁡min⁡wk,k=1,...,n∑i≠jXi×1w1×2w2⋯×nwn−Xj×1w1×2w2⋯×nwn∣∣2Wij∑i≠jXi×1w1×2w2⋯×nwn−Xj×1w1×2w2⋯×nwn∣∣2WijP\qquad \qquad \qquad \qquad \qquad \qquad \qquad \qquad \;(w^1,\cdots,w^n)^*=\\\arg\min_{w^k,k=1,...,n}\frac{\sum_{i\ne j}\mathbf{X}_i\times_1w^1\times_2w^2\cdots\times_nw^n-\mathbf{X}_j\times_1w^1\times_2w^2\cdots\times_nw^n||^2W_{ij}}{\sum_{i\ne j}\mathbf{X}_i\times_1w^1\times_2w^2\cdots\times_nw^n-\mathbf{X}_j\times_1w^1\times_2w^2\cdots\times_nw^n||^2W_{ij}^P}(w1,⋯,wn)∗=argwk,k=1,...,nmin​∑i​=j​Xi​×1​w1×2​w2⋯×n​wn−Xj​×1​w1×2​w2⋯×n​wn∣∣2WijP​∑i​=j​Xi​×1​w1×2​w2⋯×n​wn−Xj​×1​w1×2​w2⋯×n​wn∣∣2Wij​​

3. Conclusion

可以发展的方向：

  • 张量化和核函数化的结合
  • k1,k2k_1,k_2k1​,k2​ 的选择

[1] Shuicheng Yan, Member, IEEE, Dong Xu, Benyu Zhang, Hong-Jiang Zhang, Fellow, IEEE, Qiang Yang, Senior Member, IEEE, and Stephen Lin . Graph Embedding and Extensions: A General Framework for Dimensionality Reduction

entry.title: [论文笔记] Tensor Embedding Methods
entry.content:
Tensor Embedding Methods

1. Brief Review of NPR, LPP, and LDE

给定一个 n 个数据点的集合 X={x1,...,xn}∈Rm\mathcal{X} = \{x_1,...,x_n\}\in \Bbb{R}^mX={x1​,...,xn​}∈Rm , NPR, LPP 和 LDE 找到一个转换矩阵可以将每个数据点 xix_ixi​ 映射到一个对应的低维数据点 yiy_iyi​ 。 在不同的方法中，采用不同的评判标准来计算这个转换矩阵。

NPE

NPE 可以视为 LLE 的线性近似。不像传统的PCA那样注重保护全局的欧氏结构， NPE 试图取保护流形的邻接结构。同时它也不像 ISOMAP，LLE 和 Laplacian Eigenmap 这样的流形学习方法，NPE 可以直接用在任何数据点上，包括在数据样本之外的数据点。

与LLE相似，NPE 需要先基于 \cal{X} 构建一个邻接图，构建方法可以使用 k-最近邻 或 ϵ\epsilonϵ-近似度 标准。之后计算 affinity matrix S=[sij]n×x\mathbf{S}=[s_{ij}]_{n\times x}S=[sij​]n×x​ ，该矩阵的每行相加和为 1。为了得到 LLE 的线性近似，NPE的优化问题为：

argmin⁡p∑i(pTxi−∑jsijpTxj)2=pTXMXTp,s.t.pTXXTp=1arg\min_p\sum_i(\mathbf{p}^T\mathbf{x}_i-\sum_js_{ij}\mathbf{p}^T\mathbf{x}_j)^2=\mathbf{p}^T\mathbf{XMX}^T\mathbf{p},\quad s.t. \quad \mathbf{p}^T\mathbf{XX}^T\mathbf{p}=1argpmin​i∑​(pTxi​−j∑​sij​pTxj​)2=pTXMXTp,s.t.pTXXTp=1

其中 p\mathbf{p}p 是转换向量，X=[x1,...,xn],M=(I−S)T(I−S)\mathbf{X}=[\mathbf{x}_1,...,\mathbf{x}_n],\mathbf{M}=(\mathbf{I-S})^T(\mathbf{I-S})X=[x1​,...,xn​],M=(I−S)T(I−S) 且 I\mathbf{I}I 是 n×nn\times nn×n 维的识别矩阵。

LPP

与 NPE 相似，LPP 拉普拉斯特征映射的最优线性映射。给定 X\mathcal{X}X ，LPP 也需要先构建一个邻接图然后计算 affinity matrix S\mathbf{S}S 。LPP 的最优化问题为：

argmin⁡p∑ij(pTxi−pTxj)2sij=pTXLXTp,s.t.pTXDXTp=1arg\min_p\sum_{ij}(\mathbf{p}^T\mathbf{x}_i-\mathbf{p}^T\mathbf{x}_j)^2s_{ij}=\mathbf{p}^T\mathbf{XLX}^T\mathbf{p},\quad s.t. \quad \mathbf{p}^T\mathbf{XDX}^T\mathbf{p}=1argpmin​ij∑​(pTxi​−pTxj​)2sij​=pTXLXTp,s.t.pTXDXTp=1

其中 L=D−S\mathbf{L}=\mathbf{D-S}L=D−S 是图拉普拉斯算子。D\mathbf{D}D 是一个对角矩阵，且对角元素为 dii=∑jsijd_{ii}=\sum_js_{ij}dii​=∑j​sij​

LDE

LDE 是针对分类问题制定的。基于 同种类别的数据点集合的任何子集位于相同的子流形上 的假设，LDE 要寻找一个最优的转换矩阵同时考虑数据点的类别信息及数据点间的邻接关系信息。该算法的目标就是保护类内的邻接信息的同时分离不同类别的子流形。同类的邻接信息通过 类内邻接图 G 表示，不同类别间的邻接关系用类间邻接图 G’ 表示。然后我们在 G 和 G’ 上定义 affinity matrices S=[sij]n×n,S′=[sij′]n×n\mathbf{S}=[s_{ij}]_{n\times n},\quad \mathbf{S'}=[s_{ij}']_{n\times n}S=[sij​]n×n​,S′=[sij′​]n×n​。LDE 的最优化问题定义为：

argmin⁡p∑ij(pTxi−pTxj)2sij,s.t.∑ij(pTxi−pTxj)2sij′=1arg\min_p\sum_{ij}(\mathbf{p}^T\mathbf{x}_i-\mathbf{p}^T\mathbf{x}_j)^2s_{ij},\quad s.t.\quad \sum_{ij}(\mathbf{p}^T\mathbf{x}_i-\mathbf{p}^T\mathbf{x}_j)^2s'_{ij}=1argpmin​ij∑​(pTxi​−pTxj​)2sij​,s.t.ij∑​(pTxi​−pTxj​)2sij′​=1

2. Tensor Embedding Methods

2.1 Basic Terminology on Tensor Operations

让 \cal{A} 表示一个大小为 I1×⋯×IkI_1\times\cdots\times I_kI1​×⋯×Ik​ 的张量。\cal{A} 的阶数为 k 且 它的第 f 个模态的维度为 IfI_fIf​。我们用下标来表示张量中某一项的数据 \cal{A}_{i_1...,i_k}。

  • 定义一：两个张量 A,B∈RI1×...×Ik\mathcal{A,B}\in \Bbb{R}^{I_1\times ...\times I_k}A,B∈RI1​×...×Ik​ 的标量积 ⟨A,B⟩\langle \mathcal{A,B}\rangle⟨A,B⟩ 定义为 ⟨A,B⟩=def∑i1⋯∑ikAi1...ikBi1...ik∗\langle \mathcal{A,B}\rangle=^{def}\sum_{i_1}\cdots\sum_{i_k}\mathcal{A}_{i_1...i_k}\mathcal{B}^*_{i_1...i_k}⟨A,B⟩=def∑i1​​⋯∑ik​​Ai1​...ik​​Bi1​...ik​∗​，其中 * 表示共轭复数。此外，A\mathcal{A}A 的Frobenius 范数定义为 ∣∣A∣∣F=def⟨A,A⟩||\mathcal{A}||_F=^{def}\sqrt{\langle \mathcal{A,A}\rangle}∣∣A∣∣F​=def⟨A,A⟩​ 。
  • 定义二：张量 A∈RI1×...×Ik\mathcal{A}\in \Bbb{R}^{I_1\times ...\times I_k}A∈RI1​×...×Ik​ 与矩阵 U∈RJf×If\mathbf{U}\in\Bbb{R}^{J_f\times I_f}U∈RJf​×If​ 的 f 模态乘积是一个 I1×⋯×If−1×Jf×If+1×⋯×IkI_1\times\cdots\times I_{f-1}\times J_f\times I_{f+1}\times\cdots\times I_kI1​×⋯×If−1​×Jf​×If+1​×⋯×Ik​ 张量，表示为 A×fU\mathcal{A}\times_f \mathbf{U}A×f​U，其中对应的数据项为 (A×fU)i1...if−1jfif+1...ik=def∑ifAi1...if−1ifif+1...ikUjfif(\mathcal{A}\times_f\mathbf{U})_{i_1...i_{f-1}j_fi_{f+1}...i_k}=^{def}\sum_{i_f}\mathcal{A}_{i_1...i_{f-1}i_fi_{f+1}...i_k}\mathbf{U}_{j_fi_f}(A×f​U)i1​...if−1​jf​if+1​...ik​​=def∑if​​Ai1​...if−1​if​if+1​...ik​​Ujf​if​​
  • 定义三：让 A\mathcal{A}A 为 I1×⋯×IkI_1\times\cdots\times I_kI1​×⋯×Ik​ 的张量且 (π1,...,πk−1)(\pi_1,...,\pi_{k-1})(π1​,...,πk−1​) 为集合 {1,...,f−1,f+1,...,k}\{1,...,f-1,f+1,...,k\}{1,...,f−1,f+1,...,k} 的排列组合。张量 A\mathcal{A}A 的 f-模态展开为 If×∏l=1k−1IπlI_f\times \prod_{l=1}^{k-1}I_{\pi_l}If​×∏l=1k−1​Iπl​​ 矩阵，表示为 A(f)\mathcal{A}^{(f)}A(f)。定义为 A∈RI1×...×Ik⇒fA(f)∈RIf×∏l=1k−1Iπl\mathcal{A}\in\Bbb{R}^{I_1\times...\times I_k}\Rightarrow_f\mathbf{A}^{(f)}\in\Bbb{R}^{I_f\times \prod_{l=1}^{k-1}I_{\pi_l}}A∈RI1​×...×Ik​⇒f​A(f)∈RIf​×∏l=1k−1​Iπl​​，其中 \mathbf{A}^{(f)}_{i_fj}=\mathcal{A}_{i_1...i_k}\quad with \quad j=1+\sum_{l=1}^{k-1}(i_{\pi_l-1})\prod_{\tilde{l}=1}^{l-1}I_{\pi_\tilde{l}}

通常情况下，张量空间中的线性降维可以如下表述：

给定张量空间 RI1×...×Ik\Bbb{R}^{I_1\times ...\times I_k}RI1​×...×Ik​ 中的 n 个数据点 A1,...,An\mathcal{A}_1,...,\mathcal{A}_nA1​,...,An​，一个线性张量嵌入方法寻找 k 个转换矩阵 Ui∈Rli×Ii(li<Ii,i=1,...,k)\mathbf{U}_i\in\Bbb{R}^{l_i\times I_i}(l_iUi​∈Rli​×Ii​(li​<Ii​,i=1,...,k) 使得 n 个对应的嵌入数据点 B1,...,Bn∈Rl1×...×lk\mathcal{B}_1,...,\mathcal{B}_n\in\Bbb{R}^{l_1\times...\times l_k}B1​,...,Bn​∈Rl1​×...×lk​ 可以通过 Bi=Ai×1U1×2⋯×kUk(i=1,...,n)\mathcal{B}_i=\mathcal{A}_i\times_1\mathbf{U}_1\times_2\cdots\times_k\mathbf{U}_k(i=1,...,n)Bi​=Ai​×1​U1​×2​⋯×k​Uk​(i=1,...,n) 计算的得到。

2.2 Tensor Neighborhood Preserving Embedding

给定在张量空间 RI1×...×Ik\Bbb{R}^{I_1\times ...\times I_k}RI1​×...×Ik​ 中的未知流形 M\mathcal{M}M 上的 n 个数据点 A1,...,An\mathcal{A}_1,...,\mathcal{A}_nA1​,...,An​，TNPE 寻找 k 个最优的投影矩阵 Ui∈Rli×Ii(i=1,...,k)\mathbf{U}_i\in\Bbb{R}^{l_i\times I_i}(i=1,...,k)Ui​∈Rli​×Ii​(i=1,...,k) 使得 M\mathcal{M}M 局部的拓扑结构得到保护且有效地得到固有的几何特性。

首先构造一个邻接图 G 来获得 M\mathcal{M}M 的几何结构，然后使用 热核 来定义 affinity matrix S=[sij]n×n\mathbf{S}=[s_{ij}]_{n\times n}S=[sij​]n×n​

sij={exp⁡(−∣∣Ai−Aj∣∣F2/t),ifAj∈O(K,Ai);0,otherwises_{ij}=\left\{\begin{aligned}& \exp(-||\mathcal{A}_i-\mathcal{A}_j||^2_F/t), & if\mathcal{A}_j\in O(K,\mathcal{A_i});\\& 0,& otherwise\end{aligned}\right.sij​={​exp(−∣∣Ai​−Aj​∣∣F2​/t),0,​ifAj​∈O(K,Ai​);otherwise​

其中 O(K,Ai)O(K,\mathcal{A}_i)O(K,Ai​) 表示 Ai\mathcal{A}_iAi​ 的 K 个最近邻的集合，t 是一个正常量。另外 G 也可以通过 ϵ\epsilonϵ 临近度来构造。当标签信息是部分或者全部可知的情况下，类别信息也可以合并到邻接图中使得可以在半监督或监督的情况下计算嵌入。为了保护局部结构，定义了下面的目标函数：

argmin⁡Q(U1,⋯ ,Uk)=∑i∣∣Bi−∑jsijBj∣∣F2=∑i∣∣Ai×1⋯×kUk−∑jsijAj×1⋯×kUk∣∣F2arg\min Q(\mathbf{U}_1,\cdots,\mathbf{U}_k)=\sum_i||\mathcal{B}_i-\sum_js_{ij}\mathcal{B}_j||^2_F=\\\sum_i||\mathcal{A}_i\times_1\cdots\times_k\mathbf{U}_k-\sum_js_{ij}\mathcal{A}_j\times_1\cdots\times_k\mathbf{U}_k||^2_FargminQ(U1​,⋯,Uk​)=i∑​∣∣Bi​−j∑​sij​Bj​∣∣F2​=i∑​∣∣Ai​×1​⋯×k​Uk​−j∑​sij​Aj​×1​⋯×k​Uk​∣∣F2​

为了消除转换矩阵中任意取值范围的因子，加入一个限制：∑i∣∣Bi∣∣F2=∑i∣∣Ai×1⋯×kUk∣∣F2=1\sum_i||\mathcal{B}_i||^2_F=\sum_i||\mathcal{A}_i\times_1\cdots\times_k\mathbf{U}_k||^2_F=1∑i​∣∣Bi​∣∣F2​=∑i​∣∣Ai​×1​⋯×k​Uk​∣∣F2​=1 。因此TNPE的最优化问题是：

argmin⁡Q(U1,⋯ ,Uk)=∑i∣∣Ai×1⋯×kUk−∑jsijAj×1⋯×kUk∣∣F2s.t.∑i∣∣Ai×1⋯×kUk∣∣F2=1arg\min Q(\mathbf{U}_1,\cdots,\mathbf{U}_k)\\=\sum_i||\mathcal{A}_i\times_1\cdots\times_k\mathbf{U}_k-\sum_js_{ij}\mathcal{A}_j\times_1\cdots\times_k\mathbf{U}_k||^2_F\\s.t.\quad \sum_i||\mathcal{A}_i\times_1\cdots\times_k\mathbf{U}_k||^2_F=1argminQ(U1​,⋯,Uk​)=i∑​∣∣Ai​×1​⋯×k​Uk​−j∑​sij​Aj​×1​⋯×k​Uk​∣∣F2​s.t.i∑​∣∣Ai​×1​⋯×k​Uk​∣∣F2​=1

该优化问题是高维非线性问题，且有高维非线性限制，使得之间计算出转换矩阵是不可能的。通常，这类问题可以通过迭代策略来近似求解。

  • 假设 U1,⋯ ,Uf−1,Uf+1,⋯ ,Uk\mathbf{U}_1,\cdots,\mathbf{U}_{f-1},\mathbf{U}_{f+1},\cdots,\mathbf{U}_kU1​,⋯,Uf−1​,Uf+1​,⋯,Uk​ 已知，我们将 Ai×1U1⋯×f−1Uf−1×f+1Uf+1⋯×kUk\mathcal{A}_i\times_1\mathbf{U}_1\cdots\times_{f-1}\mathbf{U}_{f-1}\times_{f+1}\mathbf{U}_{f+1}\cdots\times_k\mathbf{U}_kAi​×1​U1​⋯×f−1​Uf−1​×f+1​Uf+1​⋯×k​Uk​ 为 Yif\mathcal{Y}^f_iYif​。其对应的 f 模态展开为 Yif⇒fYi(f)\mathcal{Y}_i^f\Rightarrow_f\mathbf{Y}_i^{(f)}Yif​⇒f​Yi(f)​。我们有 Yif×fUf=UfYi(f)\mathcal{Y}^f_i\times_f\mathbf{U}_f=\mathbf{U}_f\mathbf{Y}_i^{(f)}Yif​×f​Uf​=Uf​Yi(f)​

    • 对任意矩阵 H\mathbf{H}H 有 tr(HHT)=∣∣H∣∣F2tr(\mathbf{HH}^T)=||\mathbf{H}||^2_Ftr(HHT)=∣∣H∣∣F2​

    使用以上性质，(5) 的目标函数可以改写为

Pf(Uf)=∑i∣∣Yif×fUf−∑jsijYif×fUf∣∣F2=∑i∣∣UfYi(f)−∑jsijUfYj(f)∣∣F2=∑itr{Uf(Yi(f)−∑jsijYj(f))(Yi(f)−∑jsijYj(f))TUfT}=tr{Uf(∑i(Yi(f)−∑jsijYj(f))(Yi(f)−∑jsijYj(f)))TUfT}∑i∣∣Y×fUf∣∣F2=∑i∣∣UfYi(f)∣∣F2=∑itr{UfYi(f)Yi(f)TUfT}=tr{Uf(∑iYi(f)Yi(f)T)UfT}\begin{aligned}P_f(\mathbf{U}_f)&=\sum_i||\mathcal{Y}_i^f\times_f\mathbf{U}_f-\sum_js_{ij}\mathcal{Y}_i^f\times_f\mathbf{U}_f||^2_F\\&=\sum_i||\mathbf{U}_f\mathbf{Y}_i^{(f)}-\sum_js_{ij}\mathbf{U}_f\mathbf{Y}_j^{(f)}||^2_F\\&=\sum_itr\{\mathbf{U}_f(\mathbf{Y}_i^{(f)}-\sum_js_{ij}\mathbf{Y}_j^{(f)})(\mathbf{Y}_i^{(f)}-\sum_js_{ij}\mathbf{Y}_j^{(f)})^T\mathbf{U}_f^T\}\\&=tr\{\mathbf{U}_f(\sum_i(\mathbf{Y}_i^{(f)}-\sum_js_{ij}\mathbf{Y}_j^{(f)})(\mathbf{Y}_i^{(f)}-\sum_js_{ij}\mathbf{Y}_j^{(f)}))^T\mathbf{U}_f^T\}\\\end{aligned}\\\begin{aligned}\sum_i||\mathcal{Y}\times_f\mathbf{U}_f||^2_F&=\sum_i||\mathbf{U}_f\mathbf{Y}_i^{(f)}||^2_F\\&=\sum_itr\{\mathbf{U}_f\mathbf{Y}_i^{(f)}\mathbf{Y}_i^{(f)T}\mathbf{U}_f^T\}\\&=tr\{\mathbf{U}_f(\sum_i\mathbf{Y}_i^{(f)}\mathbf{Y}_i^{(f)T})\mathbf{U}_f^T\}\end{aligned}Pf​(Uf​)​=i∑​∣∣Yif​×f​Uf​−j∑​sij​Yif​×f​Uf​∣∣F2​=i∑​∣∣Uf​Yi(f)​−j∑​sij​Uf​Yj(f)​∣∣F2​=i∑​tr{Uf​(Yi(f)​−j∑​sij​Yj(f)​)(Yi(f)​−j∑​sij​Yj(f)​)TUfT​}=tr{Uf​(i∑​(Yi(f)​−j∑​sij​Yj(f)​)(Yi(f)​−j∑​sij​Yj(f)​))TUfT​}​i∑​∣∣Y×f​Uf​∣∣F2​​=i∑​∣∣Uf​Yi(f)​∣∣F2​=i∑​tr{Uf​Yi(f)​Yi(f)T​UfT​}=tr{Uf​(i∑​Yi(f)​Yi(f)T​)UfT​}​

​因此该问题变为

argmin⁡Pf(Uf)=tr{Uf(∑i(Yi(f)−∑jsijYj(f))(Yi(f)−∑jsijYj(f)))TUfT}s.t.tr{Uf(∑iYi(f)Yi(f)T)UfT}=1\qquad \qquad \qquad \qquad arg\min P_f(\mathbf{U}_f)=\\tr\{\mathbf{U}_f(\sum_i(\mathbf{Y}_i^{(f)}-\sum_js_{ij}\mathbf{Y}_j^{(f)})(\mathbf{Y}_i^{(f)}-\sum_js_{ij}\mathbf{Y}_j^{(f)}))^T\mathbf{U}_f^T\}\\s.t.\quad tr\{\mathbf{U}_f(\sum_i\mathbf{Y}_i^{(f)}\mathbf{Y}_i^{(f)T})\mathbf{U}_f^T\}=1argminPf​(Uf​)=tr{Uf​(i∑​(Yi(f)​−j∑​sij​Yj(f)​)(Yi(f)​−j∑​sij​Yj(f)​))TUfT​}s.t.tr{Uf​(i∑​Yi(f)​Yi(f)T​)UfT​}=1

转换矩阵 Uf\mathbf{U}_fUf​ 可以通过泛化特征值问题

(∑i(Yi(f)−∑jsijYj(f))(Yi(f)−∑jsijYj(f))T)u=λ(∑iYi(f)Yi(f)T)u(\sum_i(\mathbf{Y}_i^{(f)}-\sum_js_{ij}\mathbf{Y}_j^{(f)})(\mathbf{Y}_i^{(f)}-\sum_js_{ij}\mathbf{Y}_j^{(f)})^T)\mathbf{u}=\lambda(\sum_i\mathbf{Y}_i^{(f)}\mathbf{Y}_i^{(f)T})\mathbf{u}(i∑​(Yi(f)​−j∑​sij​Yj(f)​)(Yi(f)​−j∑​sij​Yj(f)​)T)u=λ(i∑​Yi(f)​Yi(f)T​)u

对应的 lfl_flf​ 个最小的特征值的特征向量求得。其他的转换矩阵可以通过相同的迭代过程进行计算。

2.3 Tensor Locality Preserving Projection

基于从流形 M⊂RI1×⋯×Ik\mathcal{M}\sub \Bbb{R}^{I_1\times\cdots\times I_k}M⊂RI1​×⋯×Ik​ 上的 n 个数据点 A1,⋯ ,An\mathcal{A}_1,\cdots,\mathcal{A}_nA1​,⋯,An​ ，我们先构建一个邻接图 G 来表示 M\mathcal{M}M 的局部几何结构。对应的 affinity matrix S=[sij]n×n\mathbf{S}=[s_{ij}]_{n\times n}S=[sij​]n×n​ 通过下面的热核函数定义：

sij={exp⁡(−∣∣Ai−Aj∣∣F2/t),ifAj∈O(K,Ai)orAi∈O(K,Aj)0,otherwises_{ij}=\left\{\begin{aligned}&\exp(-||\mathcal{A}_i-\mathcal{A}_j||^2_F/t),& if\mathcal{A}_j\in O(K,\mathcal{A}_i)\\&&or\mathcal{A}_i\in O(K,\mathcal{A}_j)\\&0, &otherwise\end{aligned}\right .sij​=⎩⎪⎨⎪⎧​​exp(−∣∣Ai​−Aj​∣∣F2​/t),0,​ifAj​∈O(K,Ai​)orAi​∈O(K,Aj​)otherwise​

用 Ui∈Rli×Ii,(i=1,⋯ ,k)\mathbf{U}_i\in\Bbb{R}^{l_i\times I_i},(i=1,\cdots,k)Ui​∈Rli​×Ii​,(i=1,⋯,k) 来表示对应的转换矩阵。基于邻接图 G，TLPP的最优化问题可以表述为：

argmin⁡Q(U1,⋯ ,Uk)=∑i,j∣∣Ai×1⋯×kUk−Aj×1⋯×kUk∣∣F2sijs.t.∑i∣∣Ai×1⋯×kUk∣∣F2dii=1\qquad \qquad \quad arg\min Q(\mathbf{U}_1,\cdots,\mathbf{U}_k)=\\\sum_{i,j}||\mathcal{A}_i\times_1\cdots\times_k\mathbf{U}_k-\mathcal{A}_j\times_1\cdots\times_k\mathbf{U}_k||^2_Fs_{ij}\\s.t.\quad \sum_i||\mathcal{A}_i\times_1\cdots\times_k\mathbf{U}_k||^2_Fd_{ii}=1argminQ(U1​,⋯,Uk​)=i,j∑​∣∣Ai​×1​⋯×k​Uk​−Aj​×1​⋯×k​Uk​∣∣F2​sij​s.t.i∑​∣∣Ai​×1​⋯×k​Uk​∣∣F2​dii​=1

通常，dii=∑jsijd_{ii}=\sum_js_{ij}dii​=∑j​sij​ 的值越大，张量空间中用于表示 Ai\mathcal{A}_iAi​ 的数据点 Bi\mathcal{B}_iBi​ 就越重要。可以看到目标函数对于相距较远的数据点 Ai,Aj\mathcal{A}_i,\mathcal{A}_jAi​,Aj​ 有较大的惩罚，因此可以使得如果 Ai,Aj\mathcal{A}_i,\mathcal{A}_jAi​,Aj​ 相距较劲，其对应的 Bi,Bj\mathcal{B}_i,\mathcal{B}_jBi​,Bj​ 也会相距较近。使用与TNPE相同的策略。最优化问题为:

argmin⁡Pf(Uf)=tr{Uf(∑i,j(Yi(f)−Yj(f))(Yi(f)−Yj(f))sij)TUfT}s.t.tr{Uf(∑iYi(f)Yi(f)Tdii)UfT}=1\qquad \qquad \qquad \qquad arg\min P_f(\mathbf{U}_f)=\\tr\{\mathbf{U}_f(\sum_{i,j}(\mathbf{Y}_i^{(f)}-\mathbf{Y}_j^{(f)})(\mathbf{Y}_i^{(f)}-\mathbf{Y}_j^{(f)})s_{ij})^T\mathbf{U}_f^T\}\\s.t.\quad tr\{\mathbf{U}_f(\sum_i\mathbf{Y}_i^{(f)}\mathbf{Y}_i^{(f)T}d_{ii})\mathbf{U}_f^T\}=1argminPf​(Uf​)=tr{Uf​(i,j∑​(Yi(f)​−Yj(f)​)(Yi(f)​−Yj(f)​)sij​)TUfT​}s.t.tr{Uf​(i∑​Yi(f)​Yi(f)T​dii​)UfT​}=1

转换矩阵可以通过求得泛化特征值问题

(∑i,j(Yi(f)−Yj(f))(Yi(f)−Yj(f))sij)Tu=λ(∑iYi(f)Yi(f)Tdii)u(\sum_{i,j}(\mathbf{Y}_i^{(f)}-\mathbf{Y}_j^{(f)})(\mathbf{Y}_i^{(f)}-\mathbf{Y}_j^{(f)})s_{ij})^T\mathbf{u}=\lambda(\sum_i\mathbf{Y}_i^{(f)}\mathbf{Y}_i^{(f)T}d_{ii})\mathbf{u}(i,j∑​(Yi(f)​−Yj(f)​)(Yi(f)​−Yj(f)​)sij​)Tu=λ(i∑​Yi(f)​Yi(f)T​dii​)u

对应 lfl_flf​ 个最小的特征值的特征向量求解。

2.4 Tensor Local Discriminant Embedding

不像TNPE和TLPP 可以使用在无监督，半监督及监督学习任务中，TLDE 只能用在监督学习任务中。给定 n 个数据点 A1,...,An∈RI1×...×Ik\mathcal{A}_1,...,\mathcal{A}_n\in\Bbb{R}^{I_1\times ...\times I_k}A1​,...,An​∈RI1​×...×Ik​ 和对应的标签 y1,⋯ ,yn∈{1,⋯ ,c}y_1,\cdots,y_n\in\{1,\cdots,c\}y1​,⋯,yn​∈{1,⋯,c}。我们假设同类的数据点集合的任意子集都位于同一子流形上。我们首先构建类内及类间邻接图 G , ***G’***。对应的 affinity matrices S[sij]n×n,S′=[sij′]n×n\mathbf{S}[s_ij]_{n\times n},\mathbf{S'}=[s'_{ij}]_{n\times n}S[si​j]n×n​,S′=[sij′​]n×n​ 由下面的热核函数计算:

sij={exp⁡(−∣∣Ai−Aj∣∣F2/t),if(Aj∈O(K,Ai))orAi∈o(K,Aj))andyi=yj0,otherwisesij′={exp⁡(−∣∣Ai−Aj∣∣F2/t),if(Aj∈O(K,Ai))orAi∈o(K,Aj))andyi≠yj0,otherwises_{ij}=\left\{\begin{aligned}&\exp(-||\mathcal{A}_i-\mathcal{A}_j||^2_F/t),&if(\mathcal{A}_j\in O(K,\mathcal{A}_i))\\&&or\mathcal{A}_i\in o(K,\mathcal{A}_j))and\quad y_i=y_j\\&0,&otherwise\end{aligned}\right .\\s_{ij}'=\left\{\begin{aligned}&\exp(-||\mathcal{A}_i-\mathcal{A}_j||^2_F/t),&if(\mathcal{A}_j\in O(K,\mathcal{A}_i))\\&&or\mathcal{A}_i\in o(K,\mathcal{A}_j))and\quad y_i\ne y_j\\&0,&otherwise\end{aligned}\right .sij​=⎩⎪⎨⎪⎧​​exp(−∣∣Ai​−Aj​∣∣F2​/t),0,​if(Aj​∈O(K,Ai​))orAi​∈o(K,Aj​))andyi​=yj​otherwise​sij′​=⎩⎪⎨⎪⎧​​exp(−∣∣Ai​−Aj​∣∣F2​/t),0,​if(Aj​∈O(K,Ai​))orAi​∈o(K,Aj​))andyi​​=yj​otherwise​

TLDE 的最优化问题表述为:

argmin⁡Q(U1,⋯ ,Uk)=∑i,j∣∣Ai×1⋯×kUk−Aj×1⋯×kUk∣∣F2sijs.t.∑i,j∣∣Ai×1⋯×kUk−Aj×1⋯×kUk∣∣F2sij′=1\begin{aligned}&\qquad\qquad\qquad\quad arg\min Q(\mathbf{U}_1,\cdots,\mathbf{U}_k)\\&=\sum_{i,j}||\mathcal{A}_i\times_1\cdots\times_k\mathbf{U}_k-\mathcal{A}_j\times_1\cdots\times_k\mathbf{U}_k||^2_Fs_{ij}\\&s.t.\quad \sum_{i,j}||\mathcal{A}_i\times_1\cdots\times_k\mathbf{U}_k-\mathcal{A}_j\times_1\cdots\times_k\mathbf{U}_k||^2_Fs_{ij}'=1\end{aligned}​argminQ(U1​,⋯,Uk​)=i,j∑​∣∣Ai​×1​⋯×k​Uk​−Aj​×1​⋯×k​Uk​∣∣F2​sij​s.t.i,j∑​∣∣Ai​×1​⋯×k​Uk​−Aj​×1​⋯×k​Uk​∣∣F2​sij′​=1​

该最优化问题再保持同类型数据点保持近距离之外，防止不同类别的数据点相互接近。我们再次使用迭代策略来求解。

argmin⁡Pf(Uf)=tr{UfT(∑i,jsij(Yi(f)−Yj(f))(Yi(f)−Yj(f))T)Uf}s.t.tr{UfT(∑i,jsij′(Yi(f)−Yj(f))(Yi(f)−Yj(f)))TUf}=1\qquad \qquad \qquad \qquad arg\min P_f(\mathbf{U}_f)=\\tr\{\mathbf{U}_f^T(\sum_{i,j}s_{ij}(\mathbf{Y}_i^{(f)}-\mathbf{Y}_j^{(f)})(\mathbf{Y}_i^{(f)}-\mathbf{Y}_j^{(f)})^T)\mathbf{U}_f\}\\s.t.\quad tr\{\mathbf{U}_f^T(\sum_{i,j}s_{ij}'(\mathbf{Y}_i^{(f)}-\mathbf{Y}_j^{(f)})(\mathbf{Y}_i^{(f)}-\mathbf{Y}_j^{(f)}))^T\mathbf{U}_f\}=1argminPf​(Uf​)=tr{UfT​(i,j∑​sij​(Yi(f)​−Yj(f)​)(Yi(f)​−Yj(f)​)T)Uf​}s.t.tr{UfT​(i,j∑​sij′​(Yi(f)​−Yj(f)​)(Yi(f)​−Yj(f)​))TUf​}=1

转换矩阵可以通过求解泛化特征值问题

(∑i,jsij(Yi(f)−Yj(f))(Yi(f)−Yj(f)))Tu=λ(∑i,jsij′(Yi(f)−Yj(f))(Yi(f)−Yj(f))T)u(\sum_{i,j}s_{ij}(\mathbf{Y}_i^{(f)}-\mathbf{Y}_j^{(f)})(\mathbf{Y}_i^{(f)}-\mathbf{Y}_j^{(f)}))^T\mathbf{u}=\lambda(\sum_{i,j}s_{ij}'(\mathbf{Y}_i^{(f)}-\mathbf{Y}_j^{(f)})(\mathbf{Y}_i^{(f)}-\mathbf{Y}_j^{(f)})^T)\mathbf{u}(i,j∑​sij​(Yi(f)​−Yj(f)​)(Yi(f)​−Yj(f)​))Tu=λ(i,j∑​sij′​(Yi(f)​−Yj(f)​)(Yi(f)​−Yj(f)​)T)u

lfl_flf​ 个最小特征值对应的特征向量求得。

3. Experimental Result

NPE,LPP & LDETNPE,TLPP & TLDE
SPACEO(H2)O(H^2)O(H2)O(nH)O(nH)O(nH)
TIMEO(H3)O(H^3)O(H3)O(k(n2HImax+Imax3))O(k(n^2HI_{max}+I^3_{max}))O(k(n2HImax​+Imax3​))

其中 H=∏i=1kIiH=\prod_{i=1}^kI_iH=∏i=1k​Ii​ ，k 为张量的阶数，Imax=max⁡{I1,⋯Ik}I_{max}=\max\{I_1,\cdots I_k\}Imax​=max{I1​,⋯Ik​} ，在很多现实应用中，n 数据样本数通常小于数据的维度之和 H。

[1] Guang Dai & Dit-Yan Yeung , Kowloon. Tensor Embedding Methods . Department of Computer Science,Hong Kong University of Science and Technology, Clear Water Bay, Kowloon, Hong Kong

entry.title: [论文笔记] Spectral Regression: A Regression Framework for Efficient Regularized Subspace Learning
entry.content:
Spectral Regression: A Regression Framework for Efficient Regularized Subspace Learning

1. Introduction

Various manifold learning techniques, such as IOSMAP, Locally Linear Embedding(LLE) and Laplacian Eigenmap have been proposed which reduce the dimensionality of a fixed training set in a way that maximally preserve certain inter-point relationships.

  • LLE and Laplacian Eigenmap are local methods which attempt to preserve local geometry of the data
  • ISOMAP is a global method which attempts to preserve geometry at all scales.
  • One of the major limitations of these methods is that they do not generally provide a functional mapping between the high and low dimensional spaces that are valid both on and off the training data.

2. Graph Embedding View of Subspace learning

Let x1,...,xnx_1,...,x_nx1​,...,xn​ be the n data points sampled from an underlying submanifold MMM embedded in RmR^mRm , dimensionality reduction aims at finding {zi}i=1n⊂Rd,d<<m\{z_i\}_{i=1}^n\subset R^d,d<{zi​}i=1n​⊂Rd,d<<m , where ziz_izi​ can "represent " xix_ixi​ . Despite the different motivations of algorithms which have been proposed to solve this problem, they can be interpreted in a general graph embedding framework .

2.1 Manifold Learning and Graph Embedding

For simplicity, we consider one dimensional mapping. Let yiy_iyi​ be the one dimensional map of xi,i=1,...,nx_i,i=1,...,nxi​,i=1,...,n .

2.1.1 Locally Linear Embedding

The basis idea of LLE is that the data points might reside on a nonlinear submanifold, but it might be reasonable to assume that each local neighborhood is linear. Thus we can characterize the local geometry of these patches by linear coefficients that reconstruct each data point from its neighbors.

We first construct a k nearest neighbor graph G with weight matrix M. Reconstructing errors are measured by the cost function:

ϕ(M)=∑i=1n∣∣xi−∑j=1nMijxj∣∣2,s.t.∑j=1nMij=1\phi(M)=\sum_{i=1}^n||x_i-\sum_{j=1}^nM_{ij}x_j||^2,\quad s.t.\sum_{j=1}^nM_{ij}=1ϕ(M)=i=1∑n​∣∣xi​−j=1∑n​Mij​xj​∣∣2,s.t.j=1∑n​Mij​=1

Consider the problem of mapping the original data points to a line so that each data point on the line can be represented as a linear combination of its neighbors with the coefficients MijM_{ij}Mij​ . Let y=(y1,y2,...,ym)Ty=(y_1,y_2,...,y_m)^Ty=(y1​,y2​,...,ym​)T be such a map. A reasonable criterion for choosing a “good” map is to minimize the following loss function:

Φ(y)=∑i=1n(yi−∑j=1nMijyj)2\Phi(y)=\sum_{i=1}^n(y_i-\sum_{j=1}^nM_{ij}y_j)^2Φ(y)=i=1∑n​(yi​−j=1∑n​Mij​yj​)2

We fix the weights MijM_{ij}Mij​ here while optimizing the coordinates yiy_iyi​ .

Φ(y)=∑i=1n(yi−Miy)2=∑i=1n(yi2+(Miy)2−2yiMiy)=yTy+yTMTMy−2yTMy=yT(I−M)T(I−M)y\Phi(y) =\sum_{i=1}^n(y_i-M_iy)^2=\sum_{i=1}^n(y_i^2+(M_iy)^2-2y_iM_iy)\\=y^Ty + y^TM^TMy-2y^TMy\\=y^T(I-M)^T(I-M)yΦ(y)=i=1∑n​(yi​−Mi​y)2=i=1∑n​(yi2​+(Mi​y)2−2yi​Mi​y)=yTy+yTMTMy−2yTMy=yT(I−M)T(I−M)y

It can be shown that the optimal embedding yyy is given by the eigenvector corresponding to the minimum eigenvalue of the following eigen-problem:

(I−M)T(I−M)y=λy(I-M)^T(I-M)y=\lambda y(I−M)T(I−M)y=λy

where I is an m×mm\times mm×m identity matrix. Defind matrix WLLE=M+MT−MTMW_{LLE}=M+M^T-M^TMWLLE​=M+MT−MTM , We can rewrite the eigen-problem as:

(I−WLLE)y=λy  ⟹  WLLEy=(1−λ)y(I-W_{LLE})y=\lambda y\implies W_{LLE}y=(1-\lambda)y(I−WLLE​)y=λy⟹WLLE​y=(1−λ)y

Thus, the optimal embedding yyy is given by the eigenvector corresponding to the maximum eigenvalue of the eigen-problem:

WLLEy=λyW_{LLE}y=\lambda yWLLE​y=λy

2.1.2 ISOMAP

Let dMd_MdM​ be the geodesic distance measure on MMM and ddd the standard Euclidean distance measure in RmR^mRm . ISOMAP aims to find a Euclidean embedding such that Euclidean distances in RmR^mRm can provide a good approximation to the geodesic distances on MMM . That is

fopt=argmin⁡f∑i,j(dM(xi,xj)−d(f(xi),f(xj)))2f^{opt}=arg\min_f \sum_{i,j}(d_M(x_i,x_j)-d(f(x_i),f(x_j)))^2fopt=argfmin​i,j∑​(dM​(xi​,xj​)−d(f(xi​),f(xj​)))2

In real life data set, the underlying manifold MMM is often unknown and hence the geodesic distance measure is also unknown.

  • We first construct a k nearest neighbor graph G over all data points to model the local geometry to discover the intrinsic geometrical structure of M .
  • The geodesic distances dM(i,j)d_M(i,j)dM​(i,j) between all pairs of points on the manifold M can be estimated by computing their shortest path distances dG(i,j)d_G(i,j)dG​(i,j) on the graph G.

The procedure is named Floyd-Warshall algorithm

  1. Initialize dG(xi,xj)=d(xi,xj)d_G(x_i,x_j)=d(x_i,x_j)dG​(xi​,xj​)=d(xi​,xj​) if xix_ixi​ and xjx_jxj​ are linked by an edge.dG(xi,xj)=∞d_G(x_i,x_j)=\infindG​(xi​,xj​)=∞ otherwise.
  2. For each value of l=1,2,...,nl=1,2,...,nl=1,2,...,n in turn, replace all entries dG(xi,xy)d_G(x_i,x_y)dG​(xi​,xy​) by min⁡{dG(xi,xj),dG(xi,xl)+dG(xl,xj)}\min\{d_G(x_i,x_j),d_G(x_i,x_l)+d_G(x_l,x_j)\}min{dG​(xi​,xj​),dG​(xi​,xl​)+dG​(xl​,xj​)}.
  3. The matrix of final value DG={dG(xi,xj}D_G=\{d_G(x_i,x_j\}DG​={dG​(xi​,xj​} will contain the shortest path distances between all pairs of points in G.

Let DYD_YDY​ denote the matrix of Euclidean distances in the reduced subspace, i,e, {dY(i,j)=∣∣yi−yj∣∣}\{d_Y(i,j)=||y_i-y_j||\}{dY​(i,j)=∣∣yi​−yj​∣∣} . Thus, ISOMAP aims to minimize the cost function:

∣∣τ(DG)−τ(DY)∣∣L2||\tau(D_G)-\tau(D_Y)||_{L^2}∣∣τ(DG​)−τ(DY​)∣∣L2​

where the τ\tauτ operator converts distances to inner products, which uniquely characterize the geometry of the data in a form that supports efficient optimization.

  • τ(D)=−−HSH2\tau(D)=-\frac{-HSH}{2}τ(D)=−2−HSH​ where Sij=Dij2S_{ij}=D_{ij}^2Sij​=Dij2​ and H=I−1meeT,e=(1,1,...,1)TH=I-\frac{1}{m}ee^T,e=(1,1,...,1)^TH=I−m1​eeT,e=(1,1,...,1)T . Define WISOMAP=τ(DG)W_{ISOMAP}=\tau(D_G)WISOMAP​=τ(DG​) , it can be shown that the optimal embedding y=(y1,...,ym)y=(y_1,...,y_m)y=(y1​,...,ym​) is given the eigenvector of the matrix WISOMAPW_{ISOMAP}WISOMAP​ corresponding to the largest eigenvalue.

    WISOMAPy=λyW_{ISOMAP}y=\lambda yWISOMAP​y=λy

2.1.3 Laplacian Eigenmap

The optimal maps can be obtained by solving the following minimization problem:

min⁡y∑i,j=1n(yi−yj)2Wij=min⁡y2yTLy\min_y\sum_{i,j=1}^n(y_i-y_j)^2W_{ij}=\min_y2y^TLyymin​i,j=1∑n​(yi​−yj​)2Wij​=ymin​2yTLy

where L=D−WL=D-WL=D−W is the graph Laplacian and Dii=∑jWijD_ii=\sum_jW_{ij}Di​i=∑j​Wij​ . The optimal embedding yyy is given by the eigenvector corresponding to the minimum eigenvalue of the following generalized eigen-problem:

Ly=λDyLy=\lambda DyLy=λDy

which is equivalent to find the eigenvector corresponding to the maximum eigenvalue of the following generalized eigen-problem:

Wy=λDyWy=\lambda DyWy=λDy

2.1.4 Graph Embedding

Given a graph G with n vertices, each representing a data point, let W be a symmetric n×nn\times nn×n matrix with WijW_{ij}Wij​ having the weight of the edge joining vertices i and j. The G and W can be defined to characterize certain statistical or geometric properties of the data set.

  • The purpose of graph embedding is to represent each vertex of the graph as a low dimensional vector that preserves similarities between the vertex pairs, where similarity is measured by the edge weight.

Let y=[y1,y2,...,yn]Ty=[y_1,y_2,...,y_n]^Ty=[y1​,y2​,...,yn​]T be the map from the graph vertices to the real line. yyy 的最优解是最小化

∑i,j(yi−yj)2Wij\sum_{i,j}(y_i-y_j)^2W_{ij}i,j∑​(yi​−yj​)2Wij​

最小化该目标函数即要求若顶点 i 和顶点 j 在原空间中相近，投影后两点也应该相近。经过简单的代数变换可得：

∑i,j(yi−yj)2Wij=2yTLy\sum_{i,j}(y_i-y_j)^2W_{ij}=2y^TLyi,j∑​(yi​−yj​)2Wij​=2yTLy

其中 L 是***图拉普拉斯算子 (graph Laplacian)***.最终，最小化问题转化为

y∗=argmin⁡yTDy=1yTLy=argmin⁡yTLyyTDy=argmax⁡yTWyyTDyy^*=arg\min_{y^TDy=1}y^TLy=arg\min\frac{y^TLy}{y^TDy}=arg\max\frac{y^TWy}{y^TDy}y∗=argyTDy=1min​yTLy=argminyTDyyTLy​=argmaxyTDyyTWy​

其中 yTDy=1y^TDy=1yTDy=1 是防止投影后的值域不同。

[1] D.Cai,SpectralRegression:ARegressionFrameworkforEfficientRegularized
Subspace Learning,Ph.D.Thesis,DepartmentofComputerScience,University
of IllinoisatUrbana-Champaign,May2009.

entry.title: [论文笔记] Eigenfaces vs. Fisherfaces: Recognition Using Class Specific Linear Projection
entry.content:
Eigenfaces vs. Fisherfaces: Recognition Using Class Specific Linear Projection

1. Methods

问题可以简单表述问：给定一个标有人脸身份的人脸图片集合(The learning set) 和 一个没有标签的集合(The test set)，我们需要识别出测试集中人脸的身份。

1.1 Correlation

最简单的分类策略就是在图片空间下的最近邻分类器。在这个策略下，测试集中的一张图片被识别为在训练集中与之最相近点的标签。两个数据点间的距离在图片空间中进行计算。如果所有的图片数据点都标准化为均值为零，方差为1，那么这个过程就等价于在训练集中寻找与测试数据最相关的数据点。因为均值归一化的过程，结果与光源强度无关。

该方法有几个缺点：

  1. 如果训练集测试集中的数据是在不同的光线条件下采集的，那么对应的数据点在图片空间中就不会紧密聚集在一起。所以为了使该方法在变化光线的条件下更可靠的运行，我们需要一个在不同可能光线下密集采集。
  2. 计算两个数据点的相关度的计算量很大。
  3. 需要大量的存储空间，训练集中对个人都需要数张图片。

1.2 Eigenfaces

给定一个包含N个样本图片的数据集 {x1,x2,...,xN}\{x_1,x_2,...,x_N\}{x1​,x2​,...,xN​} ，其中每个样本都属于n为图像空间，并且我们假设每个图片样本都属于 {X1,X2,...,Xc}\{X_1,X_2,...,X_c\}{X1​,X2​,...,Xc​} 中的一个类别。

使用一个线性变换将初始的n维数据映射到m为特征空间，其中 m<nmm<n . 计算得到的特征向量 y∈Rmy\in R^my∈Rm 定义为 yk=WTxkk=1,2,...,Ny_k=W^Tx_k\quad k=1,2,...,Nyk​=WTxk​k=1,2,...,N ，其中 W∈Rn×mW\in R^{n\times m}W∈Rn×m 使一个正交矩阵。定义Total scatter matrix STS_TST​ 为：

ST=∑k=1N(xk−μ)(xk−μ)TS_T=\sum_{k=1}^N(x_k-\mu)(x_k-\mu)^TST​=k=1∑N​(xk​−μ)(xk​−μ)T

其中N是数据集中的样本数，μ∈Rn\mu\in R^nμ∈Rn是所有样本数据的均值。进行线性变换后的特征向量{y1,y2,...,yN}\{y_1,y_2,...,y_N\}{y1​,y2​,...,yN​}的 scatter 是WTSTWW^TS_TWWTST​W. 在PCA中，投影矩阵WoptW_{opt}Wopt​ 通过最大化total scatter matrix 的行列式值来计算投影矩阵。

Wopt=argmax⁡W∣WTSTW∣=[w1w2...wm]W_{opt}=arg\max_W|W^TS_TW|=[w_1\quad w_2\quad...\quad w_m]Wopt​=argWmax​∣WTST​W∣=[w1​w2​...wm​]

其中{wi∣i=1,2,...,m}\{w_i|i=1,2,...,m\}{wi​∣i=1,2,...,m} 是由STS_TST​ 属于其最大的 m 个特征值的特征向量组成的集合。因为特征向量与初始图片拥有相同的维度，他们也被称为特征脸。

  • 该方法的一个缺陷是 scatter 包含了 between-class scatter 和 within-class scatter 的信息，其中类内的信息是不需要的。如果数据包含在不同光线下的面部图片，投影矩阵WoptW_{opt}Wopt​ 将会保留光线的变化信息，这样的结果是投影后的数据点将不会很好的聚集。
  • 可以将对应最大三个特征值的特征向量去掉来解决光线变换的问题。我们希望第一个主成分包含光线变换的信息，但是第一个主成分仅对于光线变换，舍弃这个主成分也会导致一些可用于判别的信息的遗失。

1.3 Linear Subspaces

一个在被找一个无限远点光源照射的 Lambertian 平面上的一点 p。用s∈R3s\in R^3s∈R3 表示光源强度与光源方向单位向量的成绩。当该平面被一个摄像机观察，得到的p 点的图像强度为：

E(p)=a(p)n(p)TsE(p)=a(p)n(p)^TsE(p)=a(p)n(p)Ts

其中n(p)n(p)n(p) 是p 点的单位法向量，a(p)a(p)a(p) 是p点的反照率。在没有阴影的情况下，在同一视点，给定在三个方向已知且相互独立的光源条件下的图片，可以计算出反射率和表面的法向量。即用三张在任意光线方向的原始图片可以重构出图片中的表面，称为光度立体。

对每一个人脸，使用三张或者更多在不同光线方向下的图片来构造一个线性子空间的3D基。三个基向量与训练数据的维度相同。在进行识别的时候，我们通过计算新突破到每个线性子空间的距离，然后选择距离最近的子空间。如果没有噪音和阴影，该方法将会达到零错误率。

  • 由于自遮挡，镜面反射和面部表情，图片中人脸的一些区域会有不满足线性子空间模型的变化性。 给定足够数据的情况下，我们应该能够学习哪些区域可以用来人脸识别，而哪些区域不行
  • 在识别阶段，需要计算测试数据与不同子空间的距离，该操作计算量大。
  • 存储方面，对每个人脸都需要存储三张图片。

1.4 Fisherfaces

定义 between-class scatter 矩阵：

SB=∑i=1CNi(μi−μ)(μi−μ)TS_B=\sum_{i=1}^C N_i(\mu_i-\mu)(\mu_i-\mu)^TSB​=i=1∑C​Ni​(μi​−μ)(μi​−μ)T

和 within-class scatter 矩阵：

SW=∑i=1C∑xk∈Xi(xk−μi)(xk−μi)TS_W=\sum_{i=1}^C\sum_{x_k\in X_i}(x_k-\mu_i)(x_k-\mu_i)^TSW​=i=1∑C​xk​∈Xi​∑​(xk​−μi​)(xk​−μi​)T

其中 μi\mu_iμi​ 是属于类 XiX_iXi​ 的图像的均值，NiN_iNi​ 是属于类 XiX_iXi​ 的样本数据的个数。如果 SWS_WSW​ 是非奇异的，最优的投影矩阵 WoptW_{opt}Wopt​ 为使 SBS_BSB​ 和 SWS_WSW​ 比率最大的正交矩阵。

Wopt=argmax⁡W∣WTSBW∣∣WTSWW∣=[w1w2...wm]W_{opt}=arg\max_W\frac{|W^TS_BW|}{|W^TS_WW|}=[w_1\quad w_2\quad...w_m]Wopt​=argWmax​∣WTSW​W∣∣WTSB​W∣​=[w1​w2​...wm​]

其中 {wi∣=1,2,...,m}\{w_i|=1,2,...,m\}{wi​∣=1,2,...,m} 是 SBS_BSB​ 和 SWS_WSW​ 的属于最大的m个特征值 {λi∣i=1,2,...,m}\{\lambda_i|i=1,2,...,m\}{λi​∣i=1,2,...,m} 的泛化特征向量组成的集合，该泛化的特征值问题：

SBwi=λiSWwiS_Bw_i=\lambda_iS_Ww_iSB​wi​=λi​SW​wi​

至多会有 c−1c-1c−1 个非零泛化特征值，所以 m 的上界为 c−1c-1c−1，其中 c 是类别数。

通常训练集中样本数 N 是小于图片的像素数 n 的，SWS_WSW​ 的阶数的上界为 N−cN-cN−c。这就表示 SWS_WSW​ 通常会是奇异的。为了解决这个问题，我们采用Fisherfaces来避免这个问题。我们先将图片数据集投影到低维空间使得得到的 SWS_WSW​ 非奇异。这一步可以使用PCA来将维度降至 N-c，然后采用标准FLD方法来降维至 c-1。正式来讲，WoptW_{opt}Wopt​ 由下式计算：

WoptT=WfldTWpcaTW_{opt}^T=W_{fld}^TW_{pca}^TWoptT​=WfldT​WpcaT​

其中

Wpca=argmax⁡W∣WTSTW∣Wfld=argmax⁡W∣WTWpcaTSBWpcaW∣∣WTWpcaTSWWpcaW∣W_{pca}=arg\max_W|W^TS_TW| \\W_{fld}=arg\max_W\frac{|W^TW_{pca}^TS_BW_{pca}W|}{|W^TW^T_{pca}S_WW_{pca}W|}Wpca​=argWmax​∣WTST​W∣Wfld​=argWmax​∣WTWpcaT​SW​Wpca​W∣∣WTWpcaT​SB​Wpca​W∣​

WpcaW_{pca}Wpca​ 的优化是求一个 n×(N−c)n\times(N-c)n×(N−c) 矩阵，而 WfldW_{fld}Wfld​ 的优化是计算一个 (N−c)×m(N-c)\times m(N−c)×m 正交矩阵。

另一种方法是先消除 SWS_WSW​ ，极端情况下在 SWS_WSW​ 的值为零的限制下最大化 SBS_BSB​ :

Wopt=argmax⁡W∈W′∣WTSBW∣W_{opt}=arg\max_{W\in W'}|W^TS_BW|Wopt​=argW∈W′max​∣WTSB​W∣

其中 W′W'W′ 是 n×mn\times mn×m 的正交矩阵集合，这些矩阵包含在 SWS_WSW​ 的内核中

2. Experimental Results

2.1 Variation in Lighting

使用 Hallinan 在 Harvard Robotics Laboratory 构造的数据集进行试验，数据集中的每张图片中人的头保持稳定，然后照射在一个变化的主光源下。光源的方向可以用球面角表示，数据集中的数据是以 15° 递增的，如图所示：

取用其中五个人的数据构成五个子集：

使用最近邻分类器。图片都经过裁剪使头的轮廓不被包含。分别使用外推和内推法进行使用，外推法中使用子集一进行训练然后从子集一二三中取样做测试集。实验结果为：

在内推法中，使用子集一和五左右训练集然后在子集二三四上测试，实验结果为：

由该使用可得到一下结论：

  1. 所有的算法在光线正面照射时都表现得很好，当光线开始离开轴的时候，算法之间的性能变化很大
  2. 当特征脸的数量等于训练集的大小时，Eigenfaces 和 Correlation 是等价的
  3. 在Eigenface 方法中，去除前三个主成分可以使算法在变化的光线条件下达到更好的性能
  4. Linear Subspace 方法和 Finsherface 的错误率相近，但是前者需要三倍以上的内存及三倍的时间
  5. Fisherface 方法比 Eigenface 有低的错误率和更少的计算时间

2.2 Variation in Facial Expression, Eye Wear, and Lighting

实验结果如下：

Fisherface 方法的错误率比其他算法好上一半。似乎Fisherface 方法选择了一组在光线变化，表情变换和是否带眼镜上表现良好的投影。

  • Linear Subspace 方法在这个使用中性能变得很差，因为表情变换，图片不在位于一个线性子空间中了。
  • 因为Fisherface 方法趋于忽视那些对于识别作用不大的图片区域，使得结果的投影矩阵 W 区域隐藏那些高度变化的区域，比如嘴巴附近，因为它在表情变化中变化很大；另一方面，鼻子，脸颊和眉头等区域在同类内（同一人）很稳定，这些区域对人脸识别更加有意义。所以可以推测 Fisherface 方法区域减少所有类别的 within-class scatter，这可以产生对训练集外的人脸也有很好的识别能力的投影方向。
  • 所有的算法都在 full face 上有更好的性能（full face 指图片包含面部轮廓）。当算法在整个面部上训练时，面部的轮廓会被选为一个较好的特征。

[1] Peter N. Belhumeur, Joao

P. Hespanha, and David J. Kriegman . Eigenfaces vs. Fisherfaces: Recognition Using Class Specific Linear Projection . 1997

entry.title: [论文笔记] Efficient face recognition using tensor subspace regression
entry.content:
Efficient face recognition using tensor subspace regression

1. Introduction

vector-based

Three representative appearance-based methods are Eigenface using principal component analysis (PCA), Fisherface using linear discriminant analysis (LDA), and Laplacian face using locality preserving project (LPP).

Both PCA and LDA are suitable for linearly embedded manifolds. However, it has been shown that face images may reside on a nonlinear submanifold. Laplacian face explicitly considers the manifold structure and generates nonlinear subspace embeddings which preserve the local structure of the face space. Laplacian face outperforms traditional PCA and LDA-based methods

tensor-based

Tensor Subspace Analysis (TSA) finds a projection from Rm⨂RnR^m \bigotimes R^nRm⨂Rn to Rm′⨂Rn′(m′<m,n′<n)R^{m'}\bigotimes R^{n'}\quad(m'Rm′⨂Rn′(m′<m,n′<n) which preserves the local structure of the face space (nonlinear submanifold). This structured dimensionality reduction has been shown to outperform traditional vector-based dimensionality reduction on face image data.

But the time complexity is high. The algorithm cannot be properly generalized to large scale training dataset.

2. Related work

2.1 Laplacian-based subspace learning

The Algorithm (Laplacian Eigenmap)

Given k points x1,...,xkx_1,...,x_kx1​,...,xk​ in RlR^lRl , we construct a weighted graph with k nodes, one for each point, and the set of edges connecting neighboring points to each other.

  1. Step 1 : (Constructing the Graph) We put an edge between nodes i and j if xix_ixi​ and xjx_jxj​ are “close” . There are two variations:

    1. ϵ\epsilonϵ - neighborhoods. (parameter ϵ∈R\epsilon\in Rϵ∈R) Nodes i and j are connected by an edge if ∣∣xi−xj∣∣2<ϵ||x_i-x_j||^2<\epsilon∣∣xi​−xj​∣∣2<ϵ .
      • Advantages: geometrically motivated, the relationship is naturally symmetric.
      • Disadvantages: often leads to graphs with several connected components, difficult to choose ϵ\epsilonϵ
    2. n nearest neighbors. (parameter n∈Nn \in Nn∈N) Nodes i and j are connected by an edge if i is among n nearest neighbors of j or j is among n nearest neighbors of i .
      • Advantages: simpler to choose, tends to lead to connected graphs
      • Disadvantages: less geometrically intuitive

  2. Step 2. (Choosing the weights) Here as well we have two variations for weighting the edges:

    1. Heat kernel. (parameter t∈Rt\in Rt∈R). If nodes i and j are connected. put

      Wij=e−∣∣xi−xj∣∣2tW_{ij}=e^{-\frac{||x_i-x_j||^2}{t}}Wij​=e−t∣∣xi​−xj​∣∣2​

      The justification for this choice of weights will be provided later.

    2. Simple-minded. (No parameters). Wij=1W_{ij}=1Wij​=1 if and only if vectors i and j are connected by an edge. A simplification which avoids the necessity of choosing t.

  3. Step 3. (Eigenmaps) Assume the graph G, constructed above, is connected, otherwise proceed with Step for each connected component. Compute eigenvalues and eigenvectors for the generalized eigenvector problem:

    Ly=λDyLy=\lambda DyLy=λDy

    where D is diagonal weight matrix, its entries are column sums of W, Dii=∑jWjiD_{ii}=\sum_j W_{ji}Dii​=∑j​Wji​ (or row, since W is symmetric). L=D−WL=D-WL=D−W is the Laplacian matrix. Laplacian is a symmetric, positive semidefinite matrix which can be though of as an operator on functions defined on vertices of G.

    Let y0,...,yk−1y_0,...,y_{k-1}y0​,...,yk−1​ be the solutions of equation (2), ordered according to their eigenvalues with y0y_0y0​ having the smallest eigenvalue (in face 0). The image of xix_ixi​ under the embedding into the lower dimensional space RmR^mRm is given by (y1(i),...,ym(i))(y_1(i),...,y_m(i))(y1​(i),...,ym​(i)) .

Justification

Given a dataset we construct a weighted graph G=(V,E) with edges connecting nearby points to each other. Consider the problem of mapping the weighted connected graph G to a line so that connected points stay as close together as possible. We wish to choose yi∈Ry_i\in Ryi​∈R to minimize

∑i,j(yi−yj)2Wij\sum_{i,j}(y_i-y_j)^2W_{ij}i,j∑​(yi​−yj​)2Wij​

under appropriate constraints. Let y=(y1,y2,...,yn)Ty=(y_1,y_2,...,y_n)^Ty=(y1​,y2​,...,yn​)T be the map from the graph to the real line. First, note that for any yyy , we have

12∑i,j(yi−yj)2Wij=yTLy\frac{1}{2}\sum_{i,j}(y_i-y_j)^2W_{ij}=y^TLy21​i,j∑​(yi​−yj​)2Wij​=yTLy

where as before, L=D−WL=D-WL=D−W . Notice WijW_{ij}Wij​ is symmetric and Dii=∑jWijD_{ii} = \sum_jW_{ij}Dii​=∑j​Wij​ . Thus ∑i,j(yi−yj)2Wij\sum_{i,j}(y_i-y_j)^2W_{ij}∑i,j​(yi​−yj​)2Wij​ can be written as

∑i,j(yi2+yj2−2yiyj)Wij=∑iyi2Dii+∑jyj2Djj−2∑i,jyiyjWij=2yTLy\sum_{i,j}(y_i^2+y_j^2-2y_iy_j)W_{ij}=\sum_iy_i^2D_{ii} + \sum_jy_j^2D_{jj}-2\sum_{i,j}y_iy_jW_{ij}\\=2y^TLyi,j∑​(yi2​+yj2​−2yi​yj​)Wij​=i∑​yi2​Dii​+j∑​yj2​Djj​−2i,j∑​yi​yj​Wij​=2yTLy

Therefore, the minimization problem reduces to finding argmin⁡yTDy=1yTLyarg\min_{y^TDy=1}y^TLyargminyTDy=1​yTLy .

  • The constraint yTDy=1y^TDy=1yTDy=1 removes an arbitrary scaling factor in the embedding.

Matrix D provides a natural measure on the vertices of the graph. From equation (4) , we can see that L is a positive semidefinite matrix and the vector y that minimizes the objective function is given by the eigenvalue solution to the generalized eigenvalue problem Ly=λDyLy=\lambda D yLy=λDy .

Let 1 be the constant function taking value 1 at each vertex. It is easy to see that1 is an eigenvector with eigenvalue 0.

  • Dii=∑jWijD_{ii}=\sum_j W_{ij}Dii​=∑j​Wij​ 所以当y 为 1 时，等式左侧为零，右侧 DyDyDy 不为零，则 λ\lambdaλ 为零

If the graph is connected, 1 is the only eigenvector for λ=0\lambda = 0λ=0 .To eliminate this trivial solution which collapses all vertices of G onto the real number 1, we put an additional constraint of orthogonality to obtain

yopt=argmin⁡yTDy=1yTD1=0yTLyy_{opt} = arg\min_{y^TDy=1\\y^TD1=0}y^TLyyopt​=argyTDy=1yTD1=0min​yTLy

Thus, the solution yopty_{opt}yopt​ is now given by the eigenvector with the smallest non-zero eigenvalue. More generally, the embedding of the graph into Rm(m>1)R^m(m>1)Rm(m>1) is given by the n×mn\times mn×m matrix Y=[y1y2...ym]Y=[y_1y_2...y_m]Y=[y1​y2​...ym​] where the i th row, denoted by YiTY_i^TYiT​ , provides the embedding coordinates of the i th vertex. Thus we need to minimize

∑i,j∣∣Yi−Yj∣∣2Wij=tr(YTLY)\sum_{i,j}||Y_i-Y_j||^2W_{ij}=tr(Y^TLY)i,j∑​∣∣Yi​−Yj​∣∣2Wij​=tr(YTLY)

This reduces now to

Yopt=argmin⁡YTDY=Itr(YTLY)Y_{opt}=arg\min_{Y^TDY=I}tr(Y^TLY)Yopt​=argYTDY=Imin​tr(YTLY)

2.2 Problem formulation

Given a training set of data points X={X1,X2,...,Xm}X=\{X_1,X_2,...,X_m\}X={X1​,X2​,...,Xm​} where Xi∈Rn1⨂Rn2X_i\in R^{n_1}\bigotimes R^{n_2}Xi​∈Rn1​⨂Rn2​ . The task is to learn two projective matrices U of size n1×l1n_1\times l_1n1​×l1​ and V of size n2×l2n_2\times l_2n2​×l2​ which map those m points to a set of new points Y={Y1,Y2,...,Ym}Y=\{Y_1,Y_2,...,Y_m\}Y={Y1​,Y2​,...,Ym​} where Yi∈Rl1⨂Rl2(l1<n1,l2<n2)Y_i\in R^{l_1}\bigotimes R^{l_2}\quad (l_1Yi​∈Rl1​⨂Rl2​(l1​<n1​,l2​<n2​) and Yi=UTXiVY_i=U^TX_i VYi​=UTXi​V . This projection should capture the underlying structure of the data distribution.

2.3 Tensor subspace analysis

TSA aims at finding a linear projective function which preserves the local geometrical structure of the data manifold from randomly sampled data points (face images) lying on this manifold. This leads to the following objective function:

min⁡U,V∑ij∣∣UTXiV−UTXjV∣∣F2\min_{U,V}\sum_{ij}||U^TX_iV-U^TX_jV||^2_FU,Vmin​ij∑​∣∣UTXi​V−UTXj​V∣∣F2​

where ∣∣⋅∣∣F||\cdot||_F∣∣⋅∣∣F​ is the Frobenius norm of matrix. This objective function means if two data points XiX_iXi​ and XjX_jXj​ are similar (WijW_{ij}Wij​ is large). we should keep YiY_iYi​ and YjY_jYj​ close in the learned subspace. Define a diagonal matrix D with Dii=∑jWijD_{ii} = \sum_jW_{ij}Dii​=∑j​Wij​ .

In addition to preserving the local geometrical structure. TSA also maximize the global variance for the data manifold in the new subspace in order to keep data points separable.

max⁡U,V∑iDii∣∣UTXiV∣∣F2\max_{U,V}\sum_i D_{ii}||U^TX_iV||^2_FU,Vmax​i∑​Dii​∣∣UTXi​V∣∣F2​

We know that ∣∣A∣∣F2=tr(AAT),∣∣A∣∣F2=tr(ATA)||A||^2_F = tr(AA^T),\quad ||A||^2_F = tr(A^TA)∣∣A∣∣F2​=tr(AAT),∣∣A∣∣F2​=tr(ATA) .There are two objective functions

min⁡U,Vtr(UT(DV−WV)U)tr(UTDVU),min⁡U,Vtr(VT(DU−WU)V)tr(VTDUV).\min_{U,V}\frac{tr(U^T(D_V-W_V)U)}{tr(U^TD_VU)},\\\min_{U,V}\frac{tr(V^T(D_U-W_U)V)}{tr(V^TD_UV)}.U,Vmin​tr(UTDV​U)tr(UT(DV​−WV​)U)​,U,Vmin​tr(VTDU​V)tr(VT(DU​−WU​)V)​.

Here DV=∑iDiiXiVVTXiT,WV=∑ijWijXiVVTXjT,DU=∑iDiiXiTUUTXiD_V=\sum_i D_{ii}X_iVV^TX_i^T,\quad W_V=\sum_{ij}W_{ij}X_iVV^TX_j^T,\quad D_U=\sum_i D_{ii}X_i^TUU^TX_iDV​=∑i​Dii​Xi​VVTXiT​,WV​=∑ij​Wij​Xi​VVTXjT​,DU​=∑i​Dii​XiT​UUTXi​ and WU=∑ijXiTUUTXjW_U=\sum_{ij}X_i^TUU^TX_jWU​=∑ij​XiT​UUTXj​ . If we assume VVV is fixed, the optimal UUU contains the first l1l_1l1​ generalized eigenvectors which corresponding to the smallest eigenvalues of the following generalized eigenvector problem as columns:

(DV−WV)u=λDVu(D_V-W_V)u=\lambda D_Vu(DV​−WV​)u=λDV​u

Similarly, assuming UUU is fixed, the optimal VVV can be obtained by solving the following generalized eigenvector problem:

(DU−WU)v=λDUv(D_U-W_U)v=\lambda D_Uv(DU​−WU​)v=λDU​v

The two optimization problems depend on each other, a natural solution is to iteratively solve these generalized eigenvector problems.

  • TSA requires iteratively solving two generalized eigenvector problems and constantly updating all the matrices involved (DU,DV,WUandWV)(D_U,D_V,W_U\quad and\quad W_V)(DU​,DV​,WU​andWV​) . 计算量大

2.4 Regression for dimensionality reduction

Suppose we have m data points {xi}i=1m⊂Rn\{x_i\}^m_{i=1}\subset R^n{xi​}i=1m​⊂Rn and X=[x1,...,xm]X=[x_1,...,x_m]X=[x1​,...,xm​] . The projective function is denoted by a n×kn\times kn×k matrix AAA and the target point of xix_ixi​ is yi=ATxiy_i=A^Tx_iyi​=ATxi​ . Under the graph embedding framework, the objective function is

max⁡Atr(ATXWXTA)tr(ATXWXTA)\max_A\frac{tr(A^TXWX^TA)}{tr(A^TXWX^TA)}Amax​tr(ATXWXTA)tr(ATXWXTA)​

where WWW is an m×mm\times mm×m weighted adjacency matrix corresponding to a graph G which describes certain statistical or geometric properties of the dataset and D is a diagonal matrix with Dii=∑jWijD_{ii}=\sum_jW_{ij}Dii​=∑j​Wij​ .

Solving this optimization problem directly is time consuming. We first solve the follow optimization problem:

max⁡Ytr(YTWY)tr(YTDY)\max_Y\frac{tr(Y^TWY)}{tr(Y^TDY)}Ymax​tr(YTDY)tr(YTWY)​

where YYY is an m×nm\times nm×n matrix containing yyy's as row vectors (Y=XTAY=X^TAY=XTA) . Once yyy's are obtained, the optimal AAA can be computed by solving an efficient least square regression problem

min⁡A∑i=1m∣∣ATxi−yi∣∣2\min_A\sum_{i=1}^m||A^Tx_i-y_i||^2Amin​i=1∑m​∣∣ATxi​−yi​∣∣2

We can apply the idea to second order tensor spaces. Extend SR to TSR from the following two aspects:

  1. The original SR learns coefficients for a linear model, while TSR learns coefficients for a multi-linear model
  2. SR’s regression problem has a closed form solution. However, we cannot derive closed form solutions directly for those two matrix (V and U). We develop an iterative optimization approach to solve the regression problem in TSR

3. Tensor subspace regression

3.1 Algorithmic framework

The key idea is that instead of directly obtaining optimal U and V, we first compute the optimal YiY_iYi​ for each training data point XiX_iXi​ and then obtain U and V using fact Yi=UTXiVY_i=U^TX_iVYi​=UTXi​V .

min⁡∑ijWij∣∣Yi−Yj∣∣F2∑iDii∣∣Yi∣∣F2\min\frac{\sum_{ij}W_{ij}||Y_i-Y_j||^2_F}{\sum_iD_{ii}||Y_i||^2_F}min∑i​Dii​∣∣Yi​∣∣F2​∑ij​Wij​∣∣Yi​−Yj​∣∣F2​​

Recall that the size of YiY_iYi​ is l1×l2l_1\times l_2l1​×l2​. For each training data instance i. There is a one-to-one mapping between the elements of YiY_iYi​ and yiy_iyi​ . Extracting rows of YiY_iYi​ and connecting them end-to-end to form yiy_iyi​ .

Using ∣∣Yi∣∣F2=∣∣yi∣∣2||Y_i||^2_F=||y_i||^2∣∣Yi​∣∣F2​=∣∣yi​∣∣2 and ∣∣Yi−Yj∣∣F2=∣∣yi−yj∣∣2||Y_i-Y_j||^2_F=||y_i-y_j||^2∣∣Yi​−Yj​∣∣F2​=∣∣yi​−yj​∣∣2 . Then the optimization problem becomes

min⁡∑ij∣∣yi−yj∣∣2∑i∣∣yi∣∣2\min\frac{\sum_{ij}||y_i-y_j||^2}{\sum_i||y_i||^2}min∑i​∣∣yi​∣∣2∑ij​∣∣yi​−yj​∣∣2​

With simple algebraic transformations, it can be rewritten in matrix-vector form as:

min⁡tr(HTLH)tr(HTDH)\min\frac{tr(H^TLH)}{tr(H^TDH)}mintr(HTDH)tr(HTLH)​

where HHH is and m×(l1∗l2)m\times (l_1*l_2)m×(l1​∗l2​) matrix containing those yyy's as rows and L=D−WL=D-WL=D−W is the graph Laplacian matrix. The optimal HHH contains the first l1∗l2l_1*l_2l1​∗l2​ generalized eigenvectors which corresponding to the smallest eigenvalues of the following generalized eigenvector problem as columns

Lh=λDhLh=\lambda DhLh=λDh

  • The algorithmic framework of TSR algorithm consists of two phases:

    1. Solve the generalized eigenvector problem in equation (20) to obtain the optimal HHH . Then the optimal yyy's are contained in HHH as row vectors. Reconstruct each YiY_iYi​ using yiy_iyi​

    2. Find U and V which satisfy UTXiV=Yi,i=1,...,mU^TX_iV=Y_i,i=1,...,mUTXi​V=Yi​,i=1,...,m . In practice, such U and V may not exist. We use regression to obtain the optimal U and V:

      min⁡U,V∑i=1m∣∣UTXiV−Yi∣∣F2\min_{U,V}\sum_{i=1}^m||U^TX_iV-Y_i||^2_FU,Vmin​i=1∑m​∣∣UTXi​V−Yi​∣∣F2​

3.2 Solving generalized eigenvector problem

In TSA, W is defined as

Wij={e−∣∣Xi−Xj∣∣F2/σif Xi is among the k nearest neighbors of Xj, or Xj is among the k nearest neighbors of Xi0otherwiseW_{ij}=\left\{\begin{aligned}& e^{-||X_i-X_j||^2_F/ \sigma} \qquad \text{if Xi is among the k nearest neighbors of Xj, or Xj is among the k nearest neighbors of Xi}\\& 0 \qquad \text{otherwise}\end{aligned}\right.Wij​={​e−∣∣Xi​−Xj​∣∣F2​/σif Xi is among the k nearest neighbors of Xj, or Xj is among the k nearest neighbors of Xi0otherwise​

where σ\sigmaσ is a suitable constant and e−∣∣Xi−Xj∣∣F2/σe^{-||X_i-X_j||^2_F/ \sigma}e−∣∣Xi​−Xj​∣∣F2​/σ is the heat kernel.

  • This definition of W has been shown to effectively capture the underlying manifold structure of the data.

A variant definition of W considering class labels of data is given as

Wij={e−∣∣Xi−Xj∣∣F2/σif Xi and Xj belong to the same class0otherwiseW_{ij}=\left\{\begin{aligned}& e^{-||X_i-X_j||^2_F/ \sigma} \qquad \text{if Xi and Xj belong to the same class}\\& 0 \qquad \text{otherwise}\end{aligned}\right.Wij​={​e−∣∣Xi​−Xj​∣∣F2​/σif Xi and Xj belong to the same class0otherwise​

Since we concentrate on W, we convert the generalized eigen problem as:

Lh=λDh⇔(D−W)h=λDh⇔Wh=(1−λ)DhLh=\lambda Dh \Leftrightarrow (D-W)h=\lambda Dh \Leftrightarrow Wh=(1-\lambda)DhLh=λDh⇔(D−W)h=λDh⇔Wh=(1−λ)Dh

The solution consists of the first l1∗l2l_1*l_2l1​∗l2​ generalized eigenvectors (corresponding to the largest eigenvalues). We use λ~=1−λ\tilde{\lambda}=1-\lambdaλ~=1−λ to denote the eigenvalue of the eigenvector problem in equation (22).

In face recognition problems, each class corresponds to a person to be identified. Suppose we have c classes and let mkm_kmk​ denote the number of data instances in the k-th class (m1+...+mc=mm_1+...+m_c=mm1​+...+mc​=m). Without loss of generality, we can order the data instances X1,X2,...,XmX_1,X_2,...,X_mX1​,X2​,...,Xm​ so that data instances belonging to the same class are put together. So the matrix W has a block-diagonal structure

W=(W(1)0⋯00W(2)⋱⋮⋮⋱⋱00⋯0W(c))W=\begin{pmatrix}W^{(1)} & 0 & \cdots & 0\\0 & W^{(2)} & \ddots & \vdots\\\vdots & \ddots & \ddots & 0 \\0 & \cdots & 0 & W^{(c)}\end{pmatrix}W=⎝⎜⎜⎜⎜⎛​W(1)0⋮0​0W(2)⋱⋯​⋯⋱⋱0​0⋮0W(c)​⎠⎟⎟⎟⎟⎞​

where W(k)(k=1,⋯ ,c)W^{(k)}(k=1,\cdots,c)W(k)(k=1,⋯,c) is an mk×mkm_k\times m_kmk​×mk​ matrix. The D can also be viewed as a block-diagonal matrix:

D=(D(1)0⋯00D(2)⋱⋮⋮⋱⋱00⋯0D(c))D=\begin{pmatrix}D^{(1)} & 0 & \cdots & 0\\0 & D^{(2)} & \ddots & \vdots\\\vdots & \ddots & \ddots & 0 \\0 & \cdots & 0 & D^{(c)}\end{pmatrix}D=⎝⎜⎜⎜⎜⎛​D(1)0⋮0​0D(2)⋱⋯​⋯⋱⋱0​0⋮0D(c)​⎠⎟⎟⎟⎟⎞​

According to the properties of block-diagonal matrices, the eigenvalues and eigenvectors of the generalized eigenvector problem in equation (22) are the union of the eigenvalues and eigenvectors of its block generalized eigenvector problems:

W(k)h(k)=λ~D(k)h(k),k=1,⋯ ,cW^{(k)}h^{(k)}=\tilde{\lambda}D^{(k)}h^{(k)},\quad k=1,\cdots,cW(k)h(k)=λ~D(k)h(k),k=1,⋯,c

It is easy to see that 1 is the above eigen-problem’s largest eigenvalue with e(k)=[1,1,⋯ ,1]T∈Rmke^{(k)}=[1,1,\cdots,1]^T\in\R^{m_k}e(k)=[1,1,⋯,1]T∈Rmk​ as an eigenvector. Concerning W, we have c top eigenvectors belonging to eigenvalue 1 which have the following form:

hk=[0,⋯ ,0⏟∑i=1k−1mi,1,⋯ ,1⏟mk,0,⋯ ,0⏟∑i=k+1cmi]Th_k=[\underbrace{0,\cdots ,0}_{\sum_{i=1}^{k-1}m_i},\underbrace{1,\cdots ,1}_{m_k},\underbrace{0,\cdots ,0}_{\sum_{i=k+1}^cm_i}]^Thk​=[∑i=1k−1​mi​0,⋯,0​​,mk​1,⋯,1​​,∑i=k+1c​mi​0,⋯,0​​]T

In reality, we can pick any other c orthogonal vectors in the space spanned by {h1,h2,⋯ ,hc}\{h_1,h_2,\cdots ,h_c\}{h1​,h2​,⋯,hc​} as our solution to the generalized eigenvector problem in equation (20).

Since the vector e=[1,1,...,1]T∈]Rme=[1,1,...,1]^T \in ]R^me=[1,1,...,1]T∈]Rm is an eigenvector of W and it is useless for distinguishing data points belonging to different classes. We set e as the first eigenvector and employ Gram-Schmidt process (格拉姆-施密特过程构造一组正交基) to get the remaining c-1 orthogonal eigenvectors. It is these c-1 orthogonal eigenvectors that form the optimal H (as columns) for the optimization problem in equation (19).

  • 虽然我们可以计算出更多的特征向量，但是有研究表明 c-1 个特征向量足够解决 c 个类别的分类问题。

The i-th row vector of H is the target yiy_iyi​ for data instance i.

  • 由于我们将 YiY_iYi​ 展开成了 yiy_iyi​ ，我们需要解决的另一个问题是如何将 yiy_iyi​ 重构为 YiY_iYi​，更明确的说，我们需要决定 YYY 的维度，且 l1+l2=c−1l_1+l_2=c-1l1​+l2​=c−1。

3.3 Using regression to obtain optimal solution

We cannot solve the regression problem from equation (21) directly since we have two matrix variables, U and V.

  • If we assume that we have got the optimal V, then let Xi(V)=XiVX_i^{(V)}=X_iVXi(V)​=Xi​V and we can derive the following optimization problem

    U=argmin⁡U(∑i=1m∣∣UTXi(V)−Yi∣∣F2+α∣∣U∣∣F2)U=arg\min_U(\sum_{i=1}^m||U^TX_i^{(V)}-Y_i||^2_F+\alpha||U||^2_F)U=argUmin​(i=1∑m​∣∣UTXi(V)​−Yi​∣∣F2​+α∣∣U∣∣F2​)

    Here the Frobenius norm of U is added in order to make sure the optimization problem in (27) has a solution. (应该还有正则化的作用？)

  • Assume that the optimal U has been acquired and define Xi(U)=UTXiX_i^{(U)}=U^TX_iXi(U)​=UTXi​

    V=argmin⁡V(∑i=1m∣∣Xi(U)V−Yi∣∣F2+β∣∣V∣∣F2)V=arg\min_V(\sum_{i=1}^m||X_i^{(U)}V-Y_i||^2_F+\beta||V||^2_F)V=argVmin​(i=1∑m​∣∣Xi(U)​V−Yi​∣∣F2​+β∣∣V∣∣F2​)

Use an iterative method to get the optimal U and V. If we assume V is fixed, then the optimization problem of (27) is convex.

  • ∣∣A∣∣F2=tr(AAT)and∣∣A∣∣F2=tr(ATA)||A||^2_F=tr(AA^T)\quad and \quad ||A||^2_F=tr(A^TA)∣∣A∣∣F2​=tr(AAT)and∣∣A∣∣F2​=tr(ATA)

∂∂U(∑i=1m∣∣UTXi(V)−Yi∣∣F2+α∣∣U∣∣F2)=∂∂U(∑i=1mtr[(UTXi(V)−Yi)(UTXi(V)−Yi)T+αtr(UTU)])=∂∂U(∑i=1mtr(UTXi(V)(Xi(V))TU+YiYiT−Yi(Xi(V))TU−UTXi(V)YiT)+∂∂U(αtr(UTU))=∑i=1m(∂∂Utr(UTXi(V)(Xi(V))TU)−∂∂Utr(2UTXi(V)YiT))+∂∂U(αtr(UTU))=∑i=1m(2Xi(V)(Xi(V))TU−2Xi(V)YiT)+2αU=2((∑i=1mXi(V)(Xi(V))T)U+αU−∑i=1mXi(V)YiT)\begin{aligned}& \quad \frac{\partial}{\partial U}(\sum_{i=1}^m||U^TX_i^{(V)}-Y_i||^2_F+\alpha||U||^2_F)\\&=\frac{\partial}{\partial U}\left( \sum_{i=1}^mtr[(U^TX_i^{(V)}-Y_i)(U^TX_i^{(V)}-Y_i)^T+\alpha tr(U^TU)] \right)\\&=\frac{\partial}{\partial U}\left( \sum_{i=1}^mtr(U^TX_i^{(V)}(X_i^{(V)})^TU + Y_iY_i^T -Y_i(X_i^{(V)})^TU-U^TX_i^{(V)}Y_i^T \right)\\&\qquad+\frac{\partial}{\partial U}(\alpha tr(U^TU))\\&=\sum_{i=1}^m\left( \frac{\partial}{\partial U}tr(U^TX_i^{(V)}(X_i^{(V)})^TU)- \frac{\partial}{\partial U}tr(2U^TX_i^{(V)}Y_i^T) \right)\\& \qquad + \frac{\partial}{\partial U}(\alpha tr(U^TU))\\&=\sum_{i=1}^m(2X_i^{(V)}(X_i^{(V)})^TU-2X_i^{(V)}Y_i^T)+2\alpha U\\&=2\left( \left( \sum_{i=1}^mX_i^{(V)}(X_i^{(V)})^T \right) U+\alpha U- \sum_{i=1}^mX_i^{(V)}Y_i^T \right)\end{aligned}​∂U∂​(i=1∑m​∣∣UTXi(V)​−Yi​∣∣F2​+α∣∣U∣∣F2​)=∂U∂​(i=1∑m​tr[(UTXi(V)​−Yi​)(UTXi(V)​−Yi​)T+αtr(UTU)])=∂U∂​(i=1∑m​tr(UTXi(V)​(Xi(V)​)TU+Yi​YiT​−Yi​(Xi(V)​)TU−UTXi(V)​YiT​)+∂U∂​(αtr(UTU))=i=1∑m​(∂U∂​tr(UTXi(V)​(Xi(V)​)TU)−∂U∂​tr(2UTXi(V)​YiT​))+∂U∂​(αtr(UTU))=i=1∑m​(2Xi(V)​(Xi(V)​)TU−2Xi(V)​YiT​)+2αU=2((i=1∑m​Xi(V)​(Xi(V)​)T)U+αU−i=1∑m​Xi(V)​YiT​)​

We define a matrix XV\Bbb{X}_VXV​ of size n1×(l2∗m)n_1\times (l_2*m)n1​×(l2​∗m) which is generated by arranging X1(V),...,Xm(V)X_1^{(V)},...,X_m^{(V)}X1(V)​,...,Xm(V)​ in row (即 [X1(V),..,Xm(V)][X_1^{(V)},..,X_m^{(V)}][X1(V)​,..,Xm(V)​]) and define YV\Bbb{Y}_VYV​ to be an l1×(l2∗m)l_1\times(l_2*m)l1​×(l2​∗m) matrix generated by arranging Y1,...,YmY_1,...,Y_mY1​,...,Ym​ in a row (同上).

Using these matrices, we finally have

∂∂U(∑i=1m∣∣UTXi(V)−Yi∣∣F2+α∣∣U∣∣F2)=2(XVXVTU+αU−XVYVT)\frac{\partial}{\partial U}\left( \sum_{i=1}^m||U^TX_i^{(V)}-Y_i||^2_F+\alpha||U||^2_F \right)=2(\Bbb{X}_V\Bbb{X}_V^TU+\alpha U-\Bbb{X}_V\Bbb{Y}_V^T)∂U∂​(i=1∑m​∣∣UTXi(V)​−Yi​∣∣F2​+α∣∣U∣∣F2​)=2(XV​XVT​U+αU−XV​YVT​)

Letting the partial derivative vanish, we obtain U’s optimal solution:

U=(XVXVT+αIn1)−1XVYVT\bf{U}=(\Bbb{X}_V\Bbb{X}_V^T+\alpha\bf{I}_{n1})^{-1}\Bbb{X}_V\Bbb{Y}_V^TU=(XV​XVT​+αIn1​)−1XV​YVT​

where In1I_{n1}In1​ is an n1×n1n1\times n1n1×n1 identity matrix.

Similarly, if we assume U is fixed, then the optimization problem is convex, we have

∂∂V(∑i=1m∣∣Xi(U)V−Yi∣∣F2+β∣∣V∣∣F2)=∂∂V(∑i=1mtr[(Xi(V)V−Yi)(Xi(V)V−Yi)T+βtr(VTV)])=∂∂V(∑i=1mtr(VTXi(U)(Xi(U))TV+YiYiT−VT(Xi(U))TYi−YiTXi(U)V))+∂∂V(βtr(VTV))=∑i=1m(∂∂Vtr(VTXi(U)(Xi(U))TV)−∂∂Vtr(2VTXi(U)YiT))+∂∂V(βtr(VTV))=∑i=1m(2(Xi(U))TXi(U)V−2(Xi(U))TYi)+2βV=2((∑i=1m(Xi(U))TXi(U))V+βV−∑i=1m(Xi(V))TYi)=2(XUTXUV+βV−XUTYU)\begin{aligned}& \quad \frac{\partial}{\partial \bf{V}}(\sum_{i=1}^m||\bf{X_i^{(U)}V}-Y_i||^2_F+\beta||V||^2_F)\\&=\frac{\partial}{\partial \bf{V}}\left( \sum_{i=1}^mtr[\bf{(X_i^{(V)}V-Y_i)(X_i^{(V)}V-Y_i)^T}+\beta tr(\bf{V^TV})] \right)\\&=\frac{\partial}{\partial \bf{V}}\left( \sum_{i=1}^mtr(\bf{V^TX_i^{(U)}}(X_i^{(U)})^TV + Y_iY_i^T -V^T(X_i^{(U)})^TY_i-Y_i^TX_i^{(U)}V) \right)\\&\qquad+\frac{\partial}{\partial \bf{V}}(\beta tr(\bf{V^TV}))\\&=\sum_{i=1}^m\left( \frac{\partial}{\partial \bf{V}}tr(\bf{V^TX_i^{(U)}}(X_i^{(U)})^TV)- \frac{\partial}{\partial \bf{V}}tr(\bf{2V^TX_i^{(U)}Y_i^T}) \right)\\& \qquad + \frac{\partial}{\partial \bf{V}}(\beta tr(\bf{V^TV}))\\&=\sum_{i=1}^m(\bf{2(X_i^{(U)})^TX_i^{(U)}V}-\mathrm{2}(X_i^{(U)} )^TY_i)+2\beta V\\&=2\left( \left( \sum_{i=1}^m(\bf{X_i^{(U)})^TX_i^{(U)}} \right) \bf{V}+\beta V- \sum_{i=1}^m(X_i^{(V)})^TY_i \right)\\&=2(\Bbb{X}^T_U\Bbb{X}_U\mathbf{V}+\beta\mathbf{V}-\Bbb{X}_U^T\Bbb{Y}_U)\end{aligned}​∂V∂​(i=1∑m​∣∣Xi(U)​V−Yi​∣∣F2​+β∣∣V∣∣F2​)=∂V∂​(i=1∑m​tr[(Xi(V)​V−Yi​)(Xi(V)​V−Yi​)T+βtr(VTV)])=∂V∂​(i=1∑m​tr(VTXi(U)​(Xi(U)​)TV+Yi​YiT​−VT(Xi(U)​)TYi​−YiT​Xi(U)​V))+∂V∂​(βtr(VTV))=i=1∑m​(∂V∂​tr(VTXi(U)​(Xi(U)​)TV)−∂V∂​tr(2VTXi(U)​YiT​))+∂V∂​(βtr(VTV))=i=1∑m​(2(Xi(U)​)TXi(U)​V−2(Xi(U)​)TYi​)+2βV=2((i=1∑m​(Xi(U)​)TXi(U)​)V+βV−i=1∑m​(Xi(V)​)TYi​)=2(XUT​XU​V+βV−XUT​YU​)​

where XU\Bbb{X}_UXU​ is an (l1∗m)×n2(l_1*m)\times n_2(l1​∗m)×n2​ matrix obtained by arranging X1(U),...,Xm(U)\mathbf{X}_1^{(U)},...,\mathbf{X}_m^{(U)}X1(U)​,...,Xm(U)​ in a column and YU\Bbb{Y}_UYU​ is an (l1∗m)×l2(l_1*m)\times l_2(l1​∗m)×l2​ matrix obtained by arranging Y1,...,Ym\mathbf{Y}_1,...,\mathbf{Y}_mY1​,...,Ym​ in a column

XU=(X1(U)X2(U)⋮Xm(U))(l1∗m)×n2,YU=(Y1Y2⋮Ym)(l1∗m)×l2\Bbb{X}_U=\begin{pmatrix}\mathbf{X}_1^{(U)}\\\mathbf{X}_2^{(U)}\\\vdots\\\mathbf{X}_m^{(U)}\end{pmatrix}_{(l_1*m)\times n_2},\Bbb{Y}_U=\begin{pmatrix}\mathbf{Y}_1\\\mathbf{Y}_2\\\vdots\\\mathbf{Y}_m\end{pmatrix}_{(l_1*m)\times l_2}XU​=⎝⎜⎜⎜⎜⎛​X1(U)​X2(U)​⋮Xm(U)​​⎠⎟⎟⎟⎟⎞​(l1​∗m)×n2​​,YU​=⎝⎜⎜⎜⎛​Y1​Y2​⋮Ym​​⎠⎟⎟⎟⎞​(l1​∗m)×l2​​

When the partial derivative vanishes, we obtain V\mathbf{V}V's optima solution:

V=(XUTXU+βIn2)−1XUTYU\mathbf{V} = (\Bbb{X}_U^T\Bbb{X}_U+\beta\mathbf{I}_{n_2})^{-1}\Bbb{X}_U^T\Bbb{Y}_UV=(XUT​XU​+βIn2​​)−1XUT​YU​

Initially we set V to the identity matrix. In each iteration, we first use (30) to update U. Then V is updated by (32)

3.4 Time complexity analysis for TSR and TSA

Suppose we have m images, c classes, and each image is represented by an n1×n2n_1\times n_2n1​×n2​ matrix (let n=n1∗n2n=n_1*n_2n=n1​∗n2​). The sizes of U and V are n1×l1n_1\times l_1n1​×l1​ and n2×l2n_2\times l_2n2​×l2​, l1∗l2=c−1≈cl_1*l_2=c-1 \approx cl1​∗l2​=c−1≈c.

  • The first phase: The cost is mainly that of Gram-Schmidt method, which is O(mc2−c3)O(mc^2-c^3)O(mc2−c3)

  • The second phase: Use A−1B=ABA^{-1}B=A \text{\\} BA−1B=AB in matlab to avoid computing matrix inverse.

    • For (30), O(n12l2m+n1l1l2m+n1(n1−1)(n1+ml2))O(n_1^2l_2m+n_1l_1l_2m+n_1(n_1-1)(n_1+ml_2))O(n12​l2​m+n1​l1​l2​m+n1​(n1​−1)(n1​+ml2​)) ，前两项为矩阵乘法，最后一项为矩阵除法？
    • For (32), O(n22l1m+n2l1l2m+n2(n2−1)(n2+ml1))O(n_2^2l_1m+n_2l_1l_2m+n_2(n_2-1)(n_2+ml_1))O(n22​l1​m+n2​l1​l2​m+n2​(n2​−1)(n2​+ml1​))

    In each iteration we also need to re-calculate each Xi(V),Xi(U)X_i^{(V)},X_i^{(U)}Xi(V)​,Xi(U)​ and the cost sums to O(mn1n2(l1+l2))O(mn_1n_2(l_1+l_2))O(mn1​n2​(l1​+l2​))

  • Total cost for one iteration : O(n13+n23+m(n12l2+n22l1+n1l1l2+n2l1l2+n1n2l1+n1n2l2))O(n_1^3+n_2^3+m(n_1^2l_2+n_2^2l_1+n_1l_1l_2+n_2l_1l_2+n_1n_2l_1+n_1n_2l_2))O(n13​+n23​+m(n12​l2​+n22​l1​+n1​l1​l2​+n2​l1​l2​+n1​n2​l1​+n1​n2​l2​)). If we assume n1=n2=nn_1=n_2=\sqrt{n}n1​=n2​=n​ and l1=l2=cl_1=l_2=\sqrt{c}l1​=l2​=c​ , then the cost can be transformed to O(n13+n23+mnc(n+c))O(n_1^3+n_2^3+m\sqrt{nc}(\sqrt{n}+\sqrt{c}))O(n13​+n23​+mnc​(n​+c​))

Algorithm 1

Input:

  • X : X1,...,Xm\bf X_1,...,X_mX1​,...,Xm​ the set of training instances
  • max_iter : number of iterations for the second phase

Eigen-problem Phase

  1. Set e=[1,...,1]T∈Rme=[1,...,1]^T\in R^me=[1,...,1]T∈Rm as the first eigenvector and employ Gram-Schmidt process to get the remaining c-1 orthogonal eigenvectors {hk}k=1c−1\{\mathbf{h}_k\}^{c-1}_{k=1}{hk​}k=1c−1​. These eigenvectors form H=[h1,...,hc−1]m×(c−1)\mathbf{H}=[\mathbf{h}_1,...,\mathbf{h}_{c-1}]_{m\times(c-1)}H=[h1​,...,hc−1​]m×(c−1)​. The i-th row vector of H is the target yi\mathbf{y}_iyi​ for data instance i. Reconstruct each YiY_iYi​ from yiy_iyi​

Regression Phase

  1. Set V to the identity matrix
  2. For all i∈{1,1,...,m}i\in \{1,1,...,m\}i∈{1,1,...,m}, compute Xi(V)=XiV\mathbf{X}_i^{(V)}=\mathbf{X}_i\mathbf{V}Xi(V)​=Xi​V
  3. Use the equation (30) to calculate U
  4. For all i∈{1,1,...,m}i\in \{1,1,...,m\}i∈{1,1,...,m}, compute Xi(U)=UTXi\mathbf{X}_i^{(U)}=\mathbf{U}^T\mathbf{X}_iXi(U)​=UTXi​
  5. Use equation (32) to calculate V
  6. Suppose iter is the number of iterations performed. Go to step 3 if iter < max_iter, or else return U and V.

Compared with TSA

Time complexity
TSAO(t(n13+n23+m2nm))O(t(n_1^3+n_2^3+m^2n\sqrt{m}))O(t(n13​+n23​+m2nm​))
TSRO((mc2−c3)+t(n13+n23+mnc(n+c)))O((mc^2-c^3)+t(n_1^3+n_2^3+m\sqrt{nc}(\sqrt{n}+\sqrt{c})))O((mc2−c3)+t(n13​+n23​+mnc​(n​+c​)))
  • Both TSR and TSA have n13+n23n_1^3+n_2^3n13​+n23​ in their time cost estimates, the coefficients are very different (14 for TSA vs. 1 for TSR)
  • When label information is absent, TSR and TSA can use the definition of W in equation between (21) and (22). In that case, we need additional O(mn2+m2log⁡m)O(m^2_n+m^2\log{m})O(mn2​+m2logm) time cost to construct matrix W for both TSR and TSA
    • TSR needs to solve a normal generalized eigenvector problem instead in the first phase which requires O(m3)O(m^3)O(m3)

[1] Ziyu Guan, Can Wang, Zhengguang Chen, Jiajun Bu, Chun Chen . Efficient face recognition using tensor subspace regression . College of Computer Science, Zhejiang University, Hangzhou . 2010

[2] M.Belkin,P.Niyogi . Laplacian eigenmaps and spectral techniques for embedding and clustering . Advances in Neural Information Processing Systems, vol.14,2001.

entry.title: Python群发邮件脚本
entry.content:
Python群送邮件

1. 获取邮箱授权码

QQ邮箱需要获取授权码做为密码。在邮箱的设置-账户中开启POP3/SMTP功能，短信验证后获取授权码。

2. python编码

2.1 使用pandas 读取收件人邮箱及正文信息

python

2.2 使用pydocx将正文内容从docx文件中提取并转化为html

需要将正文中的空出"____"及"XX"替换为excel表格中的正文信息

python

2.3 使用smtplib及email发送邮件

使用MIMEText发送html富文本正文内容，使用MIMEMultipart发送附件。

python

2.4 整体代码

python

3. 打包python为exe可执行文件

使用pyinstaller进行打包，在anaconda的虚拟环境中打包，通过Anaconda Navigator安装pyinstaller。 初次打包中出现问题。

python

python默认的递归深度是有限的(默认是1000)，因此需要修改递归深度。在XX.py打包过程中生成的XX.spec头部添加代码，将递归深度改为5000

python

该问题解决后又遇到新问题

python

遇到该问题可以通过改变cmd窗口的编码解决，在cmd中输入chcp 650001，之后继续编译即可。最终打包完成，在dist文件夹下找到exe文件。但是打包后的exe无法运行。上网查阅资料试过几种方法后最后通过修改打包工具版本完成。本次成功打包的工具配置为：

python3.6 + pyinstaller 3.6 + setuptools 44.1.0

版本不同会导致打包后的exe文件无法执行。
